trans-unit.source: The way it works is by setting the redirection to the error before trying to include the file. If the theme fails, then the redirection will not be overwritten with the success message and the theme will not be resumed.

trans-unit.source: The way it works is by setting the redirection to the error before trying to include the plugin file. If the plugin fails, then the redirection will not be overwritten with the success message and the plugin will not be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 它的工作方式是在尝试收录插件文件之前,将重定向设置为错误。如果插件失败,那么重定向不会被成功信息覆盖,也不会恢复插件。

trans-unit.source: The way it works is by setting the redirection to the error before trying to include the plugin file. If the plugin fails, then the redirection will not be overwritten with the success message. Also, the options will not be updated and the activation hook will not be called on plugin error.
trans-unit.target: 它的工作方式是在尝试包含插件文件之前,将重定向设置为错误。如果插件失败,那么重定向将不会被成功信息覆盖。另外,在插件错误时,选项不会被更新,激活钩子也不会被调用。

trans-unit.source: There are a few filters and actions that can be used to modify the post database query.
trans-unit.target: 有一些过滤器和操作可以用来修改后数据库查询。

trans-unit.source: There are also SEO benefits to having the blog title after or to the ‘right’ of the page title. However, it is mostly common sense to have the blog title to the right with most browsers supporting tabs. You can achieve this by using the seplocation parameter and setting the value to ‘right’. This change was introduced around 2.5.0, in case backward compatibility of themes is important.
trans-unit.target: 将博客标题放在页面标题的“右边”之后或旁边也有SEO好处。但是，在大多数支持标签的浏览器中，将博客标题放在右侧通常是常识。您可以通过使用seplocation参数并将其值设置为“ right”来实现。如果主题的向后兼容性很重要，则此更改是在2.5.0左右引入的。

trans-unit.source: There are also eight other primitive capabilities which are not referenced directly in core, except in map_meta_cap(), which takes the three aforementioned meta capabilities and translates them into one or more primitive capabilities that must then be checked against the user or role, depending on the context. These additional capabilities are only used in map_meta_cap(). Thus, they are only assigned by default if the post type is registered with the ‘map_meta_cap’ argument set to true (default is false).
trans-unit.target: 除了map_meta_cap（）之外，还有八种其他基本功能没有在核心中直接引用，该功能接受上述三个元功能并将其转换为一个或多个基本功能，然后必须根据用户或角色对它们进行检查，具体取决于上下文。这些附加功能仅在map_meta_cap（）中使用。因此，只有在帖子类型注册为'map_meta_cap'参数设置为true（默认为false）的情况下，才默认分配它们。

trans-unit.source: There are caveats to proxy support. It requires that defines be made in the wp-config.php file to enable proxy support. There are also a few filters that plugins can hook into for some of the constants.
trans-unit.target: 代理支持有一些注意事项.它需要在wp-config.php文件中进行定义来启用代理支持。也有一些插件可以对一些常量进行过滤.

trans-unit.source: There are enough filters for each context to support a custom filtering without creating your own filter function. Simply create a function that hooks into the filter you need.
trans-unit.target: 每个上下文都有足够的过滤器来支持自定义过滤,而不需要创建自己的过滤器函数。只需创建一个函数,挂接到你需要的过滤器。

trans-unit.source: There are many more options available, a lot of which depend on what plugins you have installed.
trans-unit.target: 还有更多的选择,其中很多取决于你安装的插件。

trans-unit.source: There are more fine-grained filters and controls for selective disabling. This filter parallels the AUTOMATIC_UPDATER_DISABLED constant in name.
trans-unit.target: 还有更细粒度的过滤器和控制,用于选择性禁用。这个过滤器在名称上与AUTOMATIC_UPDATER_DISABLED常量类似。

trans-unit.source: There are other API functions available which abstract away the HTTP method:
trans-unit.target: 还有其他的API函数可以抽象出HTTP方法。

trans-unit.source: There are several areas of failure. For instance if PHP times out before step 6, then you will not be able to access any portion of your site. Also, since the upgrade will not continue where it left off, you will not be able to automatically remove old files and remove the ‘update_core’ option. This isn’t that bad.
trans-unit.target: 有几个故障区域。例如，如果PHP在第6步之前超时，则您将无法访问网站的任何部分。另外，由于升级将不会从中断处继续进行，因此您将无法自动删除旧文件并删除“ update_core”选项。这还不错。

trans-unit.source: There are two general use-cases for the
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,有两种使用情况。

trans-unit.source: There are two hooks, one is specifically for each term, named ‘get_term’, and the second is for the taxonomy name, ‘term_$taxonomy’. Both hooks gets the term object, and the taxonomy name as parameters. Both hooks are expected to return a Term object.
trans-unit.target: 有两个挂钩，一个专门用于每个术语，称为“ get_term”，第二个挂钩用于分类学名称，“ term_ $ taxonomy”。两个钩子都获得术语object，并将分类法名称作为参数。两个钩子都将返回Term对象。

trans-unit.source: There are two main scenarios you might want to use WP_Query in. The first is to find out what type of request WordPress is currently dealing with. The $is_* properties are designed to hold this information: use the Conditional Tags to interact here. This is the more common scenario to plugin writers (the second normally applies to theme writers).
trans-unit.target: 您可能要在两种主要情况下使用 WP_Query 。第一种情况是找出WordPress当前正在处理的请求类型。在 $is_* 属性旨在以保存这些信息：使用条件标签来这里交流。这是插件编写者比较常见的情况（第二种通常适用于主题编写者）。

trans-unit.source: There are two suffix types, the normal one and the dev suffix.
trans-unit.target: 后缀类型有两种,一种是普通后缀,一种是开发后缀。

trans-unit.source: There are two tricky parts to using this filter:
trans-unit.target: 使用这个滤波器有两个棘手的部分。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of advanced plugins – must-use and drop-ins – which can be used in a single site or Multisite network.
trans-unit.target: 有两种类型的高级插件-必须使用和直接插入-可以在单个站点或多站点网络中使用。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to manipulate the rewrite rules, one by hooking into the ‘generate_rewrite_rules’ action and gaining full control of the object or just manipulating the rewrite rule array before it is passed from the function.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法来操纵重写规则，一种是通过挂接到“ generate_rewrite_rules”操作并获得对对象的完全控制权，或者只是在从函数传递它之前操纵重写规则数组。

trans-unit.source: There can only be one hook for each shortcode. This means that if another plugin has a similar shortcode, it will override yours, or yours will override theirs depending on which order the plugins are included and/or ran.
trans-unit.target: 每个短码只能有一个钩子。这意味着,如果另一个插件有类似的短码,它将覆盖你的,或者你的将覆盖他们的,这取决于插件被包含和/或运行的顺序。

trans-unit.source: There is a ‘hook deprecated_function_run’ that will be called that can be used to get the backtrace up to what file and function called the deprecated function.
trans-unit.target: 有一个“ hook deprecated_function_run”将被调用，它可以用来追溯到哪个文件和函数称为不推荐使用的函数。

trans-unit.source: There is a check to see if permalink’s have been enabled and if so, will retrieve the pretty path. If permalinks weren’t enabled, the ID of the current post is used and appended to the correct page to go to.
trans-unit.target: 进行检查以查看是否已启用永久链接，如果启用，则将检索漂亮路径。如果未启用永久链接，则使用当前帖子的ID，并将其附加到要访问的正确页面上。

trans-unit.source: There is a filter called ‘blog_option_$option‘ with the $option being replaced with the option name. The filter takes two parameters: $value and $blog_id. It returns $value. The ‘option_$option‘ filter in get_option() is not called.
trans-unit.target: 有一个名为“ blog_option_$option ”的过滤器，其中 $option 替换为选项名称。该过滤器有两个参数： $value 和 $blog_id 。它返回 $value 。不会调用 get_option() 中的' option_$option '过滤器。

trans-unit.source: There is a hook ‘deprecated_file_included’ that will be called that can be used to get the backtrace up to what file and function included the deprecated file.
trans-unit.target: 有一个钩子“ deprecated_file_included”将被调用，该钩子可用于追溯到哪个文件和函数包含了不赞成使用的文件。

trans-unit.source: There is a hook ‘doing_it_wrong_run’ that will be called that can be used to get the backtrace up to what file and function called the deprecated function.
trans-unit.target: 有一个钩子“ doing_it_wrong_run”将被调用，该钩子可用于追溯到哪个文件和函数（已弃用的函数）。

trans-unit.source: There is a hook deprecated_argument_run that will be called that can be used to get the backtrace up to what file and function used the deprecated argument.
trans-unit.target: 有一个将被调用的钩子 deprecated_argument_run,它可以用来获取回溯到哪个文件和函数使用了废弃的参数。

trans-unit.source: There is a small "cockney" list of transformations, as well. They can be replaced if the variable
trans-unit.target: 还有一个小的 "鸡肋 "的变换列表。它们可以被替换,如果变量

trans-unit.source: There is also an action that is called whenever the function is run called, ‘pre_get_search_form’. This can be useful for outputting JavaScript that the search relies on or various formatting that applies to the beginning of the search. To give a few examples of what it can be used for.
trans-unit.target: 每当运行该函数时，还会调用一个名为“ pre_get_search_form”的操作。这对于输出搜索所依赖的JavaScript或适用于搜索开始的各种格式很有用。举例说明它的用途。

trans-unit.source: There is currently only one KSES WordPress hook, ‘pre_kses’, and it is called here. All parameters are passed to the hooks and expected to receive a string.
trans-unit.target: 当前只有一个KSES WordPress钩子'pre_kses'，在这里被称为。所有参数都传递给钩子，并期望接收一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: There is essentially a "meta meta" cap in play here, where ‘edit_post’ meta cap maps to the ‘customize’ meta cap which then maps to ‘edit_theme_options’. This is currently required in core for wp_create_post_autosave() because it will call _wp_translate_postdata() which in turn will check if a user can ‘edit_post’, but the the caps for the customize_changeset post type are all mapping to the meta capability. This should be able to be removed once #40922 is addressed in core.
trans-unit.target: 这里实际上有一个“元元”上限，其中“ edit_post”元上限映射到“ customize”元上限，然后再映射到“ edit_theme_options”。目前， wp_create_post_autosave() 的内核中需要此功能，因为它将调用 _wp_translate_postdata() ，该_wp_translate_postdata（）会依次检查用户是否可以“ edit_post”，但是custom_changeset帖子类型的上限全部映射到meta功能。一旦在内核中处理了＃40922，就应该可以将其删除。

trans-unit.source: There is no mechanism to pass in the status code, as this is set by the subclass used. Reason phrases can vary, however.
trans-unit.target: 没有传递状态码的机制,因为这是由使用的子类设置的。但是,原因短语可以不同。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to serialize values, they will be serialized if it is needed. The metadata key can only be a string with underscores. All else will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 不需要对值进行序列化,如果需要的话会对值进行序列化。元数据键只能是一个带下划线的字符串。其他的都将被删除。

trans-unit.source: There is no return value, because everything is updated on the variable you pass to it. This is one of the features with using pass by reference in PHP.
trans-unit.target: 没有返回值,因为所有的东西都是在你传递给它的变量上更新的。这也是PHP中使用pass by reference的特点之一。

trans-unit.source: There is only one default for this function, called ‘fields’ and by default is set to ‘all’. There are other defaults that can be overridden in wp_get_object_terms().
trans-unit.target: 此功能只有一个默认值，称为“字段”，默认情况下设置为“全部”。在wp_get_object_terms（）中可以覆盖其他默认值。

trans-unit.source: There should not be any space after the second dash and before the word ‘more’. There can be text or space(s) after the word ‘more’, but won’t be referenced.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个破折号之后和“更多”一词之前不应有任何空格。“更多”一词后可以有文本或空格，但不会被引用。

trans-unit.source: There’s also a plugin available to enable/disable the filter on a post-by-post basis.
trans-unit.target: 还有一个插件可用于逐个启用/禁用过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you are looking to only fire a callback when a post is first transitioned to a status, use the ‘transition_post_status’ hook instead.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您希望仅在帖子首次转换为状态时才触发回调，请改用'transition_post_status'挂钩。

trans-unit.source: These TinyMCE init settings are used to extend and override the default settings from _WP_Editors::default_settings() for the Classic block.
trans-unit.target: 这些TinyMCE初始化设置用于扩展和覆盖 _WP_Editors::default_settings() 中Classic块的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: These additional capabilities are only used in map_meta_cap(). Thus, they are only assigned by default if the post type is registered with the ‘map_meta_cap’ argument set to true (default is false).
trans-unit.target: 这些附加功能仅在map_meta_cap（）中使用。因此，只有在帖子类型注册为'map_meta_cap'参数设置为true（默认为false）的情况下，才默认分配它们。

trans-unit.source: These are parsed from the URL using the regex.
trans-unit.target: 这些都是使用regex从URL中解析出来的。

trans-unit.source: These are the options for the route that was matched.
trans-unit.target: 这些是被匹配的路线的选项。

trans-unit.source: These are the parameters set in the route registration.
trans-unit.target: 这些是在途径登记中设置的参数。

trans-unit.source: These are the parameters you’d typically find in $_FILES.
trans-unit.target: 这些是您通常在 $_FILES 找到的参数。

trans-unit.source: These are the parameters you’d typically find in $_GET.
trans-unit.target: 这些是您通常在 $_GET 找到的参数。

trans-unit.source: These are the parameters you’d typically find in $_POST.
trans-unit.target: 这些是您通常在 $_POST 找到的参数。

trans-unit.source: These arguments are mostly to make the call of paginate_links() work, so be careful if you change them.
trans-unit.target: 这些参数主要是为了使对 paginate_links() 的调用起作用，因此，如果更改它们，请务必小心。

trans-unit.source: These arrays are automatically built from the regex in twemoji.js – if they need to be updated, you should update the regex there, then run the grunt precommit:emoji job.
trans-unit.target: 这些数组是从twemoji.js中的正则表达式自动构建的–如果需要更新，则应在此更新正则表达式，然后运行 grunt precommit:emoji 作业。

trans-unit.source: These arrays are automatically built from the regex in twemoji.js – if they need to be updated, you should update the regex there, then run the npm run grunt precommit:emoji job.
trans-unit.target: 这些数组是从twemoji.js中的正则表达式自动构建的–如果需要更新，则应在此更新正则表达式，然后运行 npm run grunt precommit:emoji 作业。

trans-unit.source: These built-in types cannot be used:
trans-unit.target: 这些内置类型不能使用。

trans-unit.source: These errors will be relayed back to the client in the Ajax response.
trans-unit.target: 这些错误将在Ajax响应中转回给客户端。

trans-unit.source: These five primitive capabilities are checked in core in various locations. There are also six other primitive capabilities which are not referenced directly in core, except in map_meta_cap(), which takes the three aforementioned meta capabilities and translates them into one or more primitive capabilities that must then be checked against the user or role, depending on the context.
trans-unit.target: 这五个原始功能在各个位置的核心中进行了检查。除了map_meta_cap（）之外，还有六种其他基本功能未在内核中直接引用，该功能接受上述三个元功能并将其转换为一个或多个基本功能，然后必须根据用户或角色对它们进行检查，具体取决于上下文。

trans-unit.source: These four primitive capabilities are checked in core in various locations. There are also seven other primitive capabilities which are not referenced directly in core, except in map_meta_cap(), which takes the three aforementioned meta capabilities and translates them into one or more primitive capabilities that must then be checked against the user or role, depending on the context.
trans-unit.target: 这四个原始功能在各个位置的核心中进行了检查。除map_meta_cap（）外，还有七个其他原始功能未在核心中直接引用，该功能接受上述三个元功能并将其转换为一个或多个原始功能，然后必须根据用户或角色对它们进行检查，具体取决于上下文。

trans-unit.source: These localizations require information that may not be loaded even by init.
trans-unit.target: 这些本地化所需要的信息,即使是init也可能不会被加载。

trans-unit.source: These methods are not included in the base class but can, and should, be defined in your extended class!
trans-unit.target: 这些方法不包含在基类中,但可以而且应该在你的扩展类中定义。

trans-unit.source: These options define how the Category name will appear before the category links are displayed, if ‘categorize’ is 1. If ‘categorize’ is 0, then it will display for only the ‘title_li’ string and only if ‘title_li’ is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 这些选项定义了类别名称在显示类别链接之前的显示方式，如果“ categorize”为1。如果“ categorize”为0，则仅对“ title_li”字符串显示，并且仅当“ title_li”不为空时显示。

trans-unit.source: These performance improving indicators work by using <link rel"…">.
trans-unit.target: 这些性能改进指标通过使用 <link rel"…"> 起作用。

trans-unit.source: These properties are not built-in, but are expected by several class methods. You must define them manually in your extended class.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性并不是内置的,而是由一些类方法所期望的,你必须在你的扩展类中手动定义它们。你必须在你的扩展类中手动定义它们。

trans-unit.source: These scripts normally are enqueued just-in-time when a playlist shortcode is used. However, in the customizer, a playlist shortcode may be used in a text widget and dynamically added via selective refresh, so it is important to unconditionally enqueue them.
trans-unit.target: 当使用播放列表短码时,这些脚本通常会被及时列入。然而,在定制器中,播放列表短码可能被用于文本部件中,并通过选择性刷新动态添加,因此无条件地启用它们是很重要的。

trans-unit.source: These scripts normally are enqueued just-in-time when a video shortcode is used. In the customizer, however, widgets can be dynamically added and rendered via selective refresh, and so it is important to unconditionally enqueue them in case a widget does get added.
trans-unit.target: 当使用视频短码时,这些脚本通常都是及时地enqueued。然而,在定制器中,widget可以通过选择性刷新来动态添加和渲染,因此,在widget被添加的情况下,无条件地enqueue它们是很重要的。

trans-unit.source: These scripts normally are enqueued just-in-time when a widget is rendered. In the customizer, however, widgets can be dynamically added and rendered via selective refresh, and so it is important to unconditionally enqueue them in case a widget does get added.
trans-unit.target: 这些脚本通常会在小组件被呈现时及时被列入。然而,在定制器中,小组件可以通过选择性刷新来动态添加和渲染,因此,重要的是要无条件地将它们列入,以防小组件确实被添加。

trans-unit.source: These scripts normally are enqueued just-in-time when an audio shortcode is used. In the customizer, however, widgets can be dynamically added and rendered via selective refresh, and so it is important to unconditionally enqueue them in case a widget does get added.
trans-unit.target: 当使用音频短码时,这些脚本通常都是及时地enqueued。然而,在定制器中,widget可以通过选择性刷新来动态添加和渲染,因此,重要的是要无条件地enqueue它们,以防widget真的被添加。

trans-unit.source: These sizes are meant to enhance the way WordPress displays images on the front-end on larger, high-density devices. They make it possible to generate more suitable srcset and sizes attributes when the users upload large images.
trans-unit.target: 这些大小旨在增强WordPress在较大的高密度设备上在前端显示图像的方式。他们使人们有可能产生更适合 srcset 和 sizes 属性，当用户上传的高画质图像。

trans-unit.source: These tables are used only in multisite installations.
trans-unit.target: 这些表格只用于多站点安装。

trans-unit.source: These values are used in later tests, but the part of preparing them is more easily managed early in the class for ease of access and discovery.
trans-unit.target: 这些数值在以后的测试中会用到,但在课前准备的部分比较容易管理,方便查阅和发现。

trans-unit.source: They dynamic portion of the hook name, $this->post_type, refers to the post type slug.
trans-unit.target: 它们是钩子名称的动态部分 $this->post_type ，它表示帖子类型。

trans-unit.source: ThickBox
trans-unit.target: ThickBox

trans-unit.source: Thickbox image paths for Network Admin.
trans-unit.target: 网络管理的厚盒图像路径。

trans-unit.source: Things that aren’t switched:
trans-unit.target: 未切换的内容：

trans-unit.source: This action hook can be used to handle post data from a user registration before the registration_errors filter is called or errors are returned.
trans-unit.target: 在调用registration_errors过滤器或返回错误之前，可以使用该动作挂钩处理来自用户注册的发布数据。

trans-unit.source: This Conditional Tag checks if the user is visiting using a mobile device. This is a boolean function, meaning it returns either TRUE or FALSE. It works through the detection of the browser user agent string ($_SERVER[‘HTTP_USER_AGENT’])
trans-unit.target: 此条件标签检查用户是否正在使用移动设备进行访问。这是一个布尔函数，表示它返回TRUE或FALSE。它通过检测浏览器用户代理字符串（$ _SERVER ['HTTP_USER_AGENT']）起作用。

trans-unit.source: This URL can be overridden by specifying an environment variable WP_UPDATE_PHP_URL or by using the ‘wp_update_php_url’ filter. Providing an empty string is not allowed and will result in the default URL being used. Furthermore the page the URL links to should preferably be localized in the site language.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过指定环境变量 WP_UPDATE_PHP_URL 或使用“ wp_update_php_url”过滤器来覆盖此URL 。不允许提供空字符串，这将导致使用默认URL。此外，URL链接到的页面最好以站点语言进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: This action adds content to the end of At a Glance widget on the Dashboard. Useful for adding your own notices / information.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将内容添加到仪表板上的 "一目了然 "小组件的末尾。用于添加您自己的通知/信息。

trans-unit.source: This action can be replicated by creating a conditional in a save_post action that excludes certain post statuses.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在save_post操作中创建一个条件来复制此操作，该条件不包含某些发布状态。

trans-unit.source: This action fires multiple times and the parameters differs according to the context, if the old theme exists or not. If the old theme is missing, the parameter will be the slug of the old theme.
trans-unit.target: 这个动作会多次启动,参数根据上下文不同,旧主题是否存在而不同。如果旧主题不存在,参数将是旧主题的slug。

trans-unit.source: This action hook allows you to access data for a new user immediately after they are added to the database. The user id is passed to hook as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 通过此操作挂钩，可以在新用户将数据添加到数据库后立即访问它们。用户ID作为参数传递给钩子。

trans-unit.source: This action hook allows you to enqueue assets (such as javascript files) directly in the Theme Customizer only. To output saved settings onto your live site, you still need to output generated CSS using the wp_head hook.
trans-unit.target: 这个动作钩子可以让你排队资产（如JavaScript文件）直接在主题定制只。要将保存的设置输出到您的实时站点上，您仍然需要使用wp_head钩子输出生成的CSS 。

trans-unit.source: This action hook executes just before WordPress determines which template page to load. It is a good hook to use if you need to do a redirect with full knowledge of the content that has been queried.
trans-unit.target: 这个动作钩子会在WordPress决定加载哪个模板页面之前执行。如果您需要在完全了解被查询的内容的情况下进行重定向,这是一个很好的钩子。

trans-unit.source: This action hook is executed at the end of WordPress’s built-in request parsing method in the main WP() class.
trans-unit.target: 在主WP（）类中WordPress的内置请求解析方法的末尾执行此操作挂钩。

trans-unit.source: This action hook is executed prior to the query and is passed a string containing the assembled query. Note that this string is NOT passed by reference and manipulating this string will not affect the actual query. This is intended to be used primarily by caching plugins.
trans-unit.target: 这个操作钩子在查询之前执行,并传递一个包含集合查询的字符串。请注意,这个字符串不是通过引用传递的,并且操作这个字符串不会影响实际的查询。这个钩子主要用于缓存插件。

trans-unit.source: This action hook is generally used to save custom fields that have been added to the WordPress profile page.
trans-unit.target: 这个动作钩子一般用于保存已经添加到WordPress个人资料页面的自定义字段。

trans-unit.source: This action hook is not to be confused with the wp_authenticate() pluggable function.
trans-unit.target: 请勿将此操作挂钩与wp_authenticate（）可插拔函数混淆。

trans-unit.source: This action hook is used to add additional headers to the outgoing HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 这个动作钩子用来给发出的HTTP响应添加额外的头信息。

trans-unit.source: This action is called whenever a value for a custom column should be output for a custom post type. Combined with the manage_${post_type}_posts_columns filter, this allows you to add or remove (unset) custom columns to a list of custom post types.
trans-unit.target: 每当应为自定义帖子类型输出自定义列的值时，都会调用此操作。结合manage _ $ {post_type} _posts_columns过滤器，您可以在自定义帖子类型列表中添加或删除（取消设置）自定义列。

trans-unit.source: This action is initiated with `do_action_ref_array` rather than `do_action`. You still hook to it with `do_action`. However, there are some notable differences:
trans-unit.target: 这个动作是用`do_action_ref_array`而不是`do_action`启动的。你仍然可以用`do_action`来挂接它。然而,有一些明显的不同。

trans-unit.source: This action is located inside of wp_signon(). In contrast to the wp_login action, it is executed before the WordPress authentication process.
trans-unit.target: 此操作位于wp_signon（）内部。与wp_login操作相反，它是在WordPress身份验证过程之前执行的。

trans-unit.source: This action is used to add extra submenus and menu options to the admin panel’s menu structure. It runs after the basic admin panel menu structure is in place.
trans-unit.target: 此操作用于向管理面板的菜单结构添加额外的子菜单和菜单选项。它在基本的管理面板菜单结构就绪后运行。

trans-unit.source: This action is used to add extra submenus and menu options to the network admin panel’s menu structure. The network admin panel is only seen by a super admin in a multisite installation.
trans-unit.target: 此操作用于向网络管理面板的菜单结构添加额外的子菜单和菜单选项。只有多站点安装中的超级管理员才能看到网络管理面板。

trans-unit.source: This action maps Requests internal hook to a native WordPress action.
trans-unit.target: 这个动作将Request的内部钩子映射到一个本地的WordPress动作。

trans-unit.source: This action mustn’t be placed in an admin_init action function because the admin_init action is called after admin_menu.
trans-unit.target: 请勿将此操作放置在admin_init操作函数中，因为admin_init操作是在admin_menu之后调用的。

trans-unit.source: This adds a new
trans-unit.target: 这就增加了一个新的

trans-unit.source: This adds the endpoint to all link types indicated (e.g. posts, pages, category, author, search) and then template-loader.php includes the relevant handler file.
trans-unit.target: 这样就可以将端点添加到所有指定的链接类型中(例如帖子、页面、分类、作者、搜索),然后template-loader.php包含相关的处理文件。

trans-unit.source: This allows Core components to be excluded from being instantiated by filtering them out of the array. Note that this filter generally runs during the ‘plugins_loaded’ action, so it cannot be added in a theme.
trans-unit.target: 通过从数组中筛选出核心组件，可以将它们排除在实例化之外。请注意，此过滤器通常在“ plugins_loaded”操作期间运行，因此无法将其添加到主题中。

trans-unit.source: This allows distinguishing between an omitted parameter, and a parameter specifically set to null.
trans-unit.target: 这就可以区分省略的参数和专门设置为空的参数。

trans-unit.source: This allows for plugins to add additional constraints to prevent an application password from being used.
trans-unit.target: 这允许插件添加额外的约束条件,以防止应用程序密码被使用。

trans-unit.source: This allows for the filtering of meta box data, that should already be present by this point. Do not use as a means of adding meta box data.
trans-unit.target: 这允许过滤元框数据,此时应该已经存在了。不要将其作为添加元框数据的手段。

trans-unit.source: This allows one to short-circuit the default logic, perhaps by replacing it with a routine that is more optimal for your setup.
trans-unit.target: 这允许人们对默认的逻辑进行短路,也许可以用一个更适合你的设置的例程来代替它。

trans-unit.source: This allows theme data to be loading from an external source, or modification of data loaded from wp_prepare_themes_for_js() or WordPress.org via themes_api().
trans-unit.target: 这允许从外部源加载主题数据，或者通过 themes_api() 从 wp_prepare_themes_for_js() 或WordPress.org 加载的数据的修改。

trans-unit.source: This allows us to store emoji in a DB using the utf8 character set.
trans-unit.target: 这允许我们使用utf8字符集在DB中存储表情符号。

trans-unit.source: This also controls the display of inactive network-only plugins (plugins with "Network: true" in the plugin header).
trans-unit.target: 这也控制了只显示不活动的网络插件(插件头中带有 "网络:true "的插件)。

trans-unit.source: This also disables update notification emails. That may change in the future.
trans-unit.target: 这也禁用更新通知邮件。这在将来可能会改变。

trans-unit.source: This array should be used for clause lookup, as when the table alias and CAST type must be determined for a value of ‘orderby’ corresponding to a meta clause.
trans-unit.target: 该数组应用于子句查找，因为必须为与元子句相对应的'orderby'值确定表别名和CAST类型。

trans-unit.source: This can an associative array of strings, which will be rendered into children of the <supplemental> element. Keys become element names, and values are embedded in CDATA within those elements. Useful for passing additional information to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是字符串的关联数组，这些数组将呈现为 <supplemental> 元素的子代。键成为元素名称，值嵌入在这些元素内的CDATA中。用于将其他信息传递到浏览器。

trans-unit.source: This can be called immediately upon plugin load. It does not need to be called from a function hooked to the ‘init’ action.
trans-unit.target: 可以在插件加载后立即调用。不需要从挂钩到'init'操作的函数中调用它。

trans-unit.source: This can be either rewrite module or permalink in the HTTP query string.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是重写模块或HTTP查询字符串中的permalink。

trans-unit.source: This can be eliminated in favor of straight spl_object_hash() when 5.3 is the minimum requirement for PHP.
trans-unit.target: 当5.3是PHP的最低要求时,可以取消这个功能,而直接使用spl_object_hash()。

trans-unit.source: This can be overridden to display additional controls between the rendered bulk actions and pagination controls.
trans-unit.target: 这一点可以被重写,以便在渲染的批量操作和分页控件之间显示附加控件。

trans-unit.source: This can be used for all sorts of things:
trans-unit.target: 这可以用来做各种事情。

trans-unit.source: This can be used in the WordPress Loop or outside of it.
trans-unit.target: 这可以在WordPress Loop中使用,也可以在WordPress Loop之外使用。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to fetch any existing setting, in the event you need to modify something (like one of WordPress’s default settings).
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要修改某些内容（例如WordPress的默认设置之一），则可用于获取任何现有设置。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to store the current screen, when it’s necessary to keep it consistent with the entire instance.
trans-unit.target: 当需要使其与整个实例保持一致时，可用于存储当前屏幕。

trans-unit.source: This changes the blog ID used to create keys in blog specific groups.
trans-unit.target: 这将改变用于在博客特定组中创建键的博客ID。

trans-unit.source: This changes the blog id used to create keys in blog specific groups.
trans-unit.target: 这将改变用于在博客特定组中创建键的博客ID。

trans-unit.source: This class allows querying WordPress database tables ‘
trans-unit.target: 此类允许查询WordPress数据库表'

trans-unit.source: This class handles the upload process and passes it as if it’s a local file to the Upgrade/Installer functions.
trans-unit.target: 此类处理上传过程，并将其作为本地文件传递给Upgrade / Installer函数。

trans-unit.source: This class has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 该类已被废弃。

trans-unit.target: 此类已弃用。请改用WP_Customize_Control。

trans-unit.source: This class has been deprecated. Use WP_Customize_Section instead.
trans-unit.target: 此类已弃用。请改用WP_Customize_Section。

trans-unit.target: 此类已弃用。请改用WP_HTTP :: request。

trans-unit.source: This class has been deprecated. Use WP_User_Query instead.
trans-unit.target: 此类已弃用。请改用WP_User_Query。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to every menu item, where {object} is either a post type or a taxonomy.
trans-unit.target: 这个类被添加到每一个菜单项中,其中{对象}是一个职位类型或分类法。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to every menu item, where {type} is either “post_type” or “taxonomy”.
trans-unit.target: 此类添加到每个菜单项，其中{type}为“ post_type”或“分类”。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to every menu item.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到每一个菜单项目中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu item which has sub-items .
trans-unit.target: 这个类被添加到有子项的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to a category.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应类别的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to a custom post type or a custom taxonomy.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到与自定义职位类型或自定义分类法对应的菜单项中。

trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应于当前渲染对象的层次祖先的菜单项中,其中{object}对应于.menu-item-object-{object}的值。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to a hierachical ancestor of the currently rendered type, where {type} corresponds to the the value used for .menu-item-type-{type}.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应于当前渲染类型的等级祖先的菜单项中,其中{type}对应于.menu-item-type-{type}的值。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to a hierarchical ancestor of the currently rendered page.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应于当前渲染页面的层次祖先的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to a hierarchical ancestor of the currently rendered static page.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应于当前渲染的静态页面的层次祖先的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to a static page, where
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应于静态页面的菜单项中,其中的

trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到与静态页面对应的菜单项中,其中$ID是静态页面的ID。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to a static page.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应静态页面的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to a tag.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到与标签对应的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to post types: i.e. static pages or custom post types.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应帖子类型的菜单项中:即静态页面或自定义帖子类型。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to static pages.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应静态页面的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to taxonomies: i.e. categories, tags, or custom taxonomies.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应分类法的菜单项中:即类别、标签或自定义分类法。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to the currently rendered page.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到当前渲染页面对应的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to the currently rendered static page.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到当前渲染的静态页面对应的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to the hierachical parent of the currently rendered object, where {object} corresponds to the the value used for .menu-item-object-{object}.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应于当前渲染对象的层次父类的菜单项中,其中{object}对应于.menu-item-object-{object}使用的值。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to the hierachical parent of the currently rendered type, where {type} corresponds to the the value used for .menu-item-type-{type}.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应于当前渲染类型的层次父类的菜单项中,其中{type}对应于.menu-item-type-{type}的值。

trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应于当前渲染页面的层级父级的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to the hierarchical parent of the currently rendered static page.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到对应于当前渲染的静态页面的层级父级的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that correspond to the site front page.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到与网站首页对应的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is added to menu items that have sub pages to it.
trans-unit.target: 该类被添加到有子页面的菜单项中。

trans-unit.source: This class is meant to be used as a kind of framework, since any data queries need to be loaded, sorted, and filtered manually. Nevertheless, it is potentially a very powerful tool for developers as it creates WordPress-standard list tables, which makes it very easy to implement advanced features like pagination, actions, bulk actions, and filtering.
trans-unit.target: 这个类的目的是作为一种框架使用,因为任何数据查询都需要手动加载、排序和过滤。尽管如此,它对开发者来说是一个潜在的非常强大的工具,因为它可以创建WordPress标准的列表表,这使得它可以非常容易地实现高级功能,如分页、操作、批量操作和过滤。

trans-unit.source: This class is most useful in WordPress multi-network installations where the ability to interact with any network of sites is required.
trans-unit.target: 该类在WordPress多网络安装中最有用,因为它需要与任何网站网络互动的能力。

trans-unit.source: This class is no longer used as of the menu creation UX introduced in #40104.
trans-unit.target: 这个类在#40104中引入的菜单创建用户体验中不再使用。

trans-unit.source: This class is not used, and is included for backward compatibility only. All code should make use of WP_Http directly through its API.
trans-unit.target: 不会使用此类，并且包含该类仅是为了向后兼容。所有代码都应直接通过其API 使用WP_Http。

trans-unit.source: This class is used during load to populate the $current_blog global and setup the current site.
trans-unit.target: 此类在加载期间用于填充 $current_blog 全局变量和设置当前站点。

trans-unit.source: This class is used during load to populate the $current_site global and setup the current network.
trans-unit.target: 此类在加载期间用于填充 $current_site 全局变量和设置当前网络。

trans-unit.source: This class is used internally by WordPress to create an object called $wp_admin_bar. Most modifications to WordPress toolbar will generally be done by modifying the
trans-unit.target: WordPress内部使用此类来创建名为$ wp_admin_bar的对象。对WordPress工具栏的大多数修改通常是通过修改

trans-unit.source: This class is used to consistently make outgoing HTTP requests easy for developers while still being compatible with the many PHP configurations under which WordPress runs.
trans-unit.target: 该类用于持续为开发人员提供出站的HTTP请求,同时仍然兼容WordPress运行的许多PHP配置。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to generate the List Tables that populate WordPress’ various admin screens. It has an advantage over previous implementations in that it can be dynamically altered with AJAX and may be hooked in future WordPress releases.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于生成填充WordPress的各种管理屏幕的列表表。与以前的实现相比，它具有一个优势，因为它可以使用AJAX进行动态更改，并且可能会与将来的WordPress版本挂钩。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to interact with a database without needing to use raw SQL statements. By default, WordPress uses this class to instantiate the global $wpdb object, providing access to the WordPress database.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于与数据库交互，而无需使用原始SQL语句。默认情况下，WordPress使用此类来实例化全局$ wpdb对象，从而提供对WordPress数据库的访问。

trans-unit.source: This class is used with the Theme Customization API to allow a user to upload a file on the Theme Customizer in WordPress 3.4 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 此类与主题自定义API一起使用，以允许用户在WordPress 3.4或更高版本的主题自定义程序上上传文件。

trans-unit.source: This class is used with the Theme Customization API to render an input control on the Theme Customizer in WordPress 3.4 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 该类与WordPress 3.4或更新版本的主题定制API一起使用,以在主题定制器上渲染一个输入控件。

trans-unit.source: This class must be extended for each widget, and WP_Widget::widget() must be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 必须为每个小部件扩展此类，并且必须重写WP_Widget :: widget（）。

trans-unit.source: This clears $wpdb->last_result, $wpdb->last_query, and $wpdb->col_info.
trans-unit.target: 这将清除$ wpdb- > last_result，$ wpdb- > last_query和$ wpdb- > col_info。

trans-unit.source: This code snippet, called a “defined constant” in PHP, can be added to your wp-config.php file, your theme functions.php file, or using a free plugin like Custom Functions by LittleBizzy or My Custom Functions by Space X-Chimp.
trans-unit.target: 这段代码，在PHP中被称为“定义的常量”，可以添加到您 wp-config.php 文件，你的主题 functions.php 文件，或者使用免费的插件，像自定义功能通过LittleBizzy或我的自定义功能的太空X-黑猩猩。

trans-unit.source: This construct allows you to query multiple metadatas by using the relation parameter in the first (outer) array to describe the boolean relationship between the meta queries. Accepted arguments are ‘AND’, ‘OR’. The default is ‘AND’.
trans-unit.target: 此构造允许您通过使用第一个（外部）数组中的 relation 参数来描述元查询之间的布尔关系，从而查询多个元数据。接受的参数为“ AND”，“ OR”。默认值为“ AND”。

trans-unit.source: This construct allows you to query multiple taxonomies by using the relation parameter in the first (outer) array to describe the boolean relationship between the taxonomy arrays.
trans-unit.target: 此构造允许您通过使用第一个（外部）数组中的 relation 参数来描述多个分类法，以描述分类法数组之间的布尔关系。

trans-unit.source: This contains the data describing the API. This includes information about supported authentication schemes, supported namespaces, routes available on the API, and a small amount of data about the site.
trans-unit.target: 这包含描述API的数据。这包括关于支持的认证方案、支持的命名空间、API上可用的路由以及少量关于网站的数据。

trans-unit.source: This could be reduced to a one-liner in the calling functions, but it’s intentionally a separate function because it’s called from multiple functions, and having it abstracted keeps the logic consistent and DRY, which is less prone to errors.
trans-unit.target: 可以在调用函数中将其简化为单一代码，但是有意将其作为一个单独的函数，因为它是从多个函数中调用的，并且对其进行抽象处理可以使逻辑和DRY保持一致，从而不易出错。

trans-unit.source: This creates a link to the previous image attached to the current post. Whenever a series of images are linked to the attachment page, it will put a ‘previous image link’ with the images when viewed in the attachment page.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建指向附加到当前帖子的上一张图像的链接。只要将一系列图像链接到附件页面，当在附件页面中查看图像时，它将在图像上放置一个“上一个图像链接”。

trans-unit.source: This creates an HTML control that admins can use to change settings. This is also where you choose a section for the control to appear in.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个HTML控件,管理员可以用来更改设置。这也是你为控件选择显示区域的地方。

trans-unit.source: This custom control is only needed for JS.
trans-unit.target: 这个自定义控件只需要JS。

trans-unit.source: This data is exposed on indexes and can be used by clients or developers to investigate the site and find out how to use it. It acts as a form of self-documentation.
trans-unit.target: 这些数据暴露在索引上,客户或开发人员可以利用这些数据来调查网站并找出如何使用它。它作为一种自我记录的形式。

trans-unit.source: This depends on exif_imagetype() or getimagesize() to determine real mime types.
trans-unit.target: 这取决于exif_imagetype()或getimagesize()来确定真正的mime类型。

trans-unit.source: This deprecated function formerly set the site_name property of the $current_site object.
trans-unit.target: 这个废弃的函数之前设置了$current_site对象的site_name属性。

trans-unit.source: This deprecated function managed much of the site and network loading in multisite.
trans-unit.target: 这个被废弃的功能在多站点中管理了大部分的站点和网络加载。

trans-unit.source: This differs from strip_tags() because it removes the contents of the <script> and <style> tags. E.g. strip_tags( '<script>something</script>' ) will return ‘something’. wp_strip_all_tags will return ”
trans-unit.target: 这与strip_tags（）不同，因为它删除了 <script> 和 <style> 标记的内容。例如 strip_tags( '<script>something</script>' ) 将返回'something'。wp_strip_all_tags将返回”

trans-unit.source: This displays the user’s primary site and allows the user to choose which site is primary.
trans-unit.target: 这将显示用户的主站点，并允许用户选择哪个站点为主站点。

trans-unit.source: This document assumes familiarity with Apache‘s mod_rewrite. If you’ve never heard of this before, try reading Sitepoint’s Beginner’s Guide to URL Rewriting. Also see Otto’s explanation of hierarchy of rewrite rules in the wp-hackers email list.
trans-unit.target: 本文档假定您熟悉Apache的mod_rewrite。如果您以前从未听说过，请尝试阅读Sitepoint的URL重写入门指南。另请参阅wp-hackers电子邮件列表中的Otto对重写规则层次结构的说明。

trans-unit.source: This document assumes familiarity with Apache‘s mod_rewrite. If you’ve never heard of this before, try reading Sitepoint’s Beginner’s Guide to URL Rewriting. Also see Otto’s explanation of hierarchy of rewrite rules in the wp-hackers email list.
trans-unit.target: 本文档假定您熟悉Apache的mod_rewrite。如果您以前从未听说过，请尝试阅读Sitepoint的URL重写入门指南。另请参阅wp-hackers电子邮件列表中的Otto对重写规则层次结构的说明。

trans-unit.source: This does not actually compare whether the user ID has the actual capability, just what the capability or capabilities are. Meta capability list value can be ‘delete_user’, ‘edit_user’, ‘remove_user’, ‘promote_user’, ‘delete_post’, ‘delete_page’, ‘edit_post’, ‘edit_page’, ‘read_post’, or ‘read_page’.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，这并没有比较用户ID是否具有实际功能，也没有比较功能。元功能列表值可以是“ delete_user”，“ edit_user”，“ remove_user”，“ promote_user”，“ delete_post”，“ delete_page”，“ edit_post”，“ edit_page”，“ read_post”或“ read_page”。

trans-unit.source: This does not allow you to override the username or email of the user during registration. The values are solely used for validation and error handling.
trans-unit.target: 这不允许你在注册时覆盖用户的用户名或电子邮件。这些值仅用于验证和错误处理。

trans-unit.source: This does not indicate that the current theme supports the feature, it only describes the feature’s supported options.
trans-unit.target: 这并不表示当前主题支持该功能，而仅描述了该功能的受支持选项。

trans-unit.source: This does not mean that plugins can’t implement this function when they need to make sure that the cache is cleaned up after WordPress no longer needs it.
trans-unit.target: 这并不意味着当插件需要确保在WordPress不再需要缓存后将其清理时，它们无法实现此功能。

trans-unit.source: This echos a single item (from the
trans-unit.target: 这是一个单项的回声(从

trans-unit.source: This endpoint describes the capabilities of the site.
trans-unit.target: 这个端点描述了网站的功能。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the admin bar will be shown. It also ensures that link navigation will work as expected since the parent frame is not being sent the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 这确保了管理栏将被显示。这也确保了链接导航能像预期的那样工作,因为父框架没有被发送到导航的URL。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the new value will get sanitized and used the next time that WP_Customize_Setting::_multidimensional_preview_filter() is called for this setting.
trans-unit.target: 这样可以确保在下次为该设置调用 WP_Customize_Setting::_multidimensional_preview_filter() 时清理并使用新值。

trans-unit.source: This example lists all posts that contain a particular custom field, but sorted by the value of a second custom field.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子列出了所有包含特定自定义字段的帖子,但按第二个自定义字段的值排序。

trans-unit.source: This feature allows the use of HTML5 markup for the search forms, comment forms, comment lists, gallery, and caption.
trans-unit.target: 此功能允许将HTML5标记用于搜索表单，评论表单，评论列表，库和标题。

trans-unit.source: This feature enables Automatic Feed Links for post and comment in the head. This should be used in place of the deprecated automatic_feed_links() function.
trans-unit.target: 此功能启用了自动Feed链接，以便在头部发布和评论。应该使用它代替不推荐使用的automatic_feed_links（）函数。

trans-unit.source: This feature enables Custom_Backgrounds support for a theme.
trans-unit.target: 此功能启用对主题的Custom_Backgrounds支持。

trans-unit.source: This feature enables Custom_Headers support for a theme.
trans-unit.target: 此功能启用对主题的Custom_Headers支持。

trans-unit.source: This feature enables Post Formats support for a theme. When using child themes, be aware that
trans-unit.target: 此功能启用主题的“ 邮政格式”支持。使用子主题时，请注意

trans-unit.source: This feature enables Post Thumbnails support for a theme. Note that you can optionally pass a second argument, $args, with an array of the Post Types for which you want to enable this feature.
trans-unit.target: 此功能启用主题的“ 发布缩略图”支持。请注意，您可以选择传递第二个参数 $args ，该参数带有要为其启用此功能的Post Types数组。

trans-unit.source: This feature enables Selective Refresh for Widgets being managed within the Customizer. This feature became available in WordPress 4.5. For more on why and how Selective Refresh works read Implementing Selective Refresh Support for Widgets.
trans-unit.target: 此功能启用在定制程序中管理的窗口小部件的选择性刷新。WordPress 4.5中已提供此功能。有关为什么和如何进行选择性刷新的更多信息，请阅读实现对小部件的选择性刷新支持。

trans-unit.source: This feature enables plugins and themes to manage the document title tag. This should be used in place of wp_title() function.
trans-unit.target: 此功能使插件和主题可以管理文档标题标签。应该使用它代替wp_title（）函数。

trans-unit.source: This feature must be called before the ‘init’ hook is fired. That means it needs to be placed directly into functions.php or within a function attached to the ‘after_setup_theme’ hook. For custom post types, you can also add post thumbnails using the register_post_type() function as well.
trans-unit.target: 必须在触发“ init”挂钩之前调用此功能。这意味着需要将其直接放置在functions.php中或附加到“ after_setup_theme”钩子的函数中。对于自定义帖子类型，您还可以使用register_post_type（）函数添加帖子缩略图。

trans-unit.source: This feature, first introduced in Version_4.5, enables Theme_Logo support for a theme.
trans-unit.target: 此功能（最初在Version_4.5中引入）启用了对主题的Theme_Logo支持。

trans-unit.source: This filter allows plugins and themes to override the default gallery template (i.e. what the gallery shortcode returns).
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器允许插件和主题覆盖默认的画廊模板(即画廊短码返回的内容)。

trans-unit.source: This filter allows query vars to be added, removed, or changed prior to executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器允许在执行查询之前添加、删除或更改查询变量。

trans-unit.source: This filter allows you to adjust the server class used by the API, using a different class to handle requests.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器允许你调整API使用的服务器类,使用不同的类来处理请求。

trans-unit.source: This filter allows you to adjust the server class used by the REST API, using a different class to handle requests.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器允许你调整REST API使用的服务器类,使用不同的类来处理请求。

trans-unit.source: This filter applies to the posts where clause and allows you to restrict which posts will show up in various areas of the site. Combined with restrict_manage_posts it allows you to only show posts matching specific conditions.
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器适用于where子句中的帖子，并允许您限制哪些帖子将显示在网站的各个区域。与 restrict_manage_posts 结合使用，它仅允许您显示符合特定条件的帖子。

trans-unit.source: This filter can be used by plugin that offer CSS pre-processors, to store the original pre-processed CSS in post_content_filtered and then store processed CSS in post_content. When used in this way, the post_content_filtered should be supplied as the setting value instead of post_content via a the customize_value_custom_css filter, for example:
trans-unit.target: 提供CSS预处理程序的插件可以使用此过滤器，以将原始经过预处理的CSS 存储在 post_content_filtered 中，然后将经过处理的CSS存储在 post_content 中。当以这种方式使用时，应通过 customize_value_custom_css 过滤器提供 post_content_filtered 作为设置值，而不是 post_content ，例如：

trans-unit.source: This filter can be used in functions.php of a child theme to add/remove/modify the arguments of a menu defined in the parent theme.
trans-unit.target: 可以在子主题的functions.php中使用此过滤器，以添加/删除/修改父主题中定义的菜单的参数。

trans-unit.source: This filter can be used to add anything to the <head> section on the login page.
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器可用于将任何内容添加到登录页面的<head>部分。

trans-unit.source: This filter can be used to add new methods, and remove built-in methods.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器可以用来添加新的方法,以及删除内置方法。

trans-unit.source: This filter can be used to create custom validation rules on user registration. This fires when the form is submitted but before user information is saved to the database.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器可以用来创建用户注册的自定义验证规则。当表单提交后,但在用户信息被保存到数据库之前,这个过滤器就会启动。

trans-unit.source: This filter can currently only be used to remove bulk actions.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器目前只能用于删除批量操作。

trans-unit.source: This filter differs from the ‘post_class’ and ‘body_class’ filters in two important ways:
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器在两个重要方面不同于“ post_class”和“ body_class”过滤器：

trans-unit.source: This filter does not apply if there was a nonce or authentication failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现非ce或认证失败,该过滤器不适用。

trans-unit.source: This filter hook allows developers to adjust the number of posts that WordPress’s WP_Query class reports finding when it runs a query.
trans-unit.target: 此筛选器挂钩使开发人员可以调整WordPress的WP_Query类在运行查询时报告发现的帖子数量。

trans-unit.source: This filter hook allows you to modify various custom permastructs, such as those generated for custom post types or taxonomies (both built-in or custom).
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤钩子允许你修改各种自定义的permastructs,比如那些为自定义的帖子类型或分类法(内置或自定义)生成的permastructs。

trans-unit.source: This filter hook called by the WordPress Walker_Nav_Menu class.
trans-unit.target: 此筛选器挂钩由WordPress Walker_Nav_Menu类调用。

trans-unit.source: This filter hook can be used to any rule in the rewrite rules array.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤钩子可以用于重写规则数组中的任何规则。

trans-unit.source: This filter hook is applied to the translated text by the internationalization function that handle contexts (_x(), _ex(), esc_attr_x() and esc_html_x()).
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器钩是由国际化函数应用于翻译后的文本该句柄上下文（ _x() ， _ex() ， esc_attr_x() 和 esc_html_x() ）。

trans-unit.source: This filter hook is applied to the translated text by the internationalization function that handle contexts and plurals at the same time (_nx()).
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器挂钩由同时处理上下文和复数的国际化功能（ _nx() ）应用于翻译后的文本。

trans-unit.source: This filter hook is applied to the translated text by the internationalization function that handle plurals (_n()).
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器挂钩通过处理复数（ _n() ）的国际化功能应用于翻译后的文本。

trans-unit.source: This filter hook is applied to the translated text by the internationalization functions (__(), _e(), etc.).
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器挂钩通过国际化功能（ __() ，_ _e() 等）应用于翻译后的文本。

trans-unit.source: This filter hook is executed immediately before WordPress includes the predetermined template file. This can be used to override WordPress’s default template behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在WordPress包含预定模板文件之前，将立即执行此筛选器挂钩。这可用于覆盖WordPress的默认模板行为。

trans-unit.source: This filter hooks into the very start of the register_new_user() function of wp-login.php after the user has been sanitized and it is used to manipulate the value submitted for user_email.
trans-unit.target: 清理用户后，此过滤器将挂接到wp-login.php的register_new_user（）函数的最开始，并用于处理为user_email提交的值。

trans-unit.source: This filter is also used on about.php to check if a plugin has disabled these notifications.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器在about.php中也被用来检查是否有插件禁用了这些通知。

trans-unit.source: This filter is applied before a post-retrieving SQL statement is executed. Use it to make custom modifications to the orderby. WP_Query is versatile but there may be situations where you need to orderby a value that is in a separate database, a custom equation, etc.
trans-unit.target: 在执行检索后的SQL语句之前，将应用此过滤器。使用它可以对orderby进行自定义修改。WP_Query用途广泛，但在某些情况下，您需要按单独数据库中的值，自定义方程式等进行排序。

trans-unit.source: This filter is applied to the link URL for a term prior to printing by the function get_term_link().
trans-unit.target: 通过函数get_term_link（），此过滤器将在打印之前应用于术语的链接URL 。

trans-unit.source: This filter is applied to the option value before being saved to the database; this allows the overriding value to be stored. To use this filter, you will need to add filters for specific options names, such as “pre_update_option_foo” to filter the option “foo“.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器在保存到数据库之前将应用于选项值。这允许存储覆盖值。要使用此过滤器，您将需要为特定的选项名称添加过滤器，例如“ pre_update_option_foo ”以过滤选项“ foo ”。

trans-unit.source: This filter is applied to the url returned by the function wp_logout_url().
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器应用于函数wp_logout_url（）返回的url 。

trans-unit.source: This filter is called before the user is created or updated.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器在用户被创建或更新之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: This filter is called by the wp_trim_excerpt() function. By default, the filter is set to echo ‘[…]’ as the excerpt more string at the end of the excerpt.
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器由wp_trim_excerpt（）函数调用。默认情况下，筛选器设置为在摘要末尾作为摘要的更多字符串来回显“ […]”。

trans-unit.source: This filter is currently only used on the Widgets screen to enable accessibility mode.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器目前只在Widgets屏幕上使用,以启用无障碍模式。

trans-unit.source: This filter is evaluated under several contexts, including ’email_too_short’, ’email_no_at’, ‘local_invalid_chars’, ‘domain_period_sequence’, ‘domain_period_limits’, ‘domain_no_periods’, ‘domain_no_valid_subs’, or no context.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器在几种上下文中进行评估，包括“ email_too_short”，“ email_no_at”，“ local_invalid_chars”，“ domain_period_sequence”，“ domain_period_limits”，“ domain_no_periods”，“ domain_no_valid_subs”或无上下文。

trans-unit.source: This filter is evaluated under several different contexts, such as ’email_too_short’, ’email_no_at’, ‘local_invalid_chars’, ‘domain_period_sequence’, ‘domain_period_limits’, ‘domain_no_periods’, ‘sub_hyphen_limits’, ‘sub_invalid_chars’, or no specific context.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器在几种不同的上下文中进行评估，例如“ email_too_short”，“ email_no_at”，“ local_invalid_chars”，“ domain_period_sequence”，“ domain_period_limits”，“ domain_no_periods”，“ sub_hyphen_limits”，“ sub_invalid_chars”或无特定上下文。

trans-unit.source: This filter is first evaluated, and the value returned, if an empty string is passed to wp_richedit_pre(). If an empty string is passed, it results in a break tag and line feed.
trans-unit.target: 如果将空字符串传递给wp_richedit_pre（），则首先评估此过滤器，并返回值。如果传递了空字符串，则会导致中断标记和换行符。

trans-unit.source: This filter is for backward compatibility only, for the suppression of the upload tab.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器只为向后兼容,用于抑制上传标签。

trans-unit.source: This filter is only evaluated once per release. If the same email address was already notified of the same new version, WordPress won’t repeatedly email the administrator.
trans-unit.target: 每次发布仅评估一次此过滤器。如果已经使用相同的新版本通知了相同的电子邮件地址，则WordPress将不会重复向管理员发送电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: This filter is only fired if the error is not already configured to be handled by WordPress core. As such, it exclusively allows adding further rules for which errors should be handled, but not removing existing ones.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器只有在错误没有被配置到WordPress核心处理的情况下才会被触发。因此,它只允许添加更多的错误处理规则,但不允许删除现有的错误。

trans-unit.source: This filter is only fired when an endpoint is requested which is not already protected by WordPress core. As such, it exclusively allows providing further protected endpoints in addition to the admin backend, login pages and protected AJAX actions.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器只有在请求一个还没有被WordPress核心保护的端点时才会被触发,因此,它只允许在管理后台、登录页面和受保护的AJAX动作之外提供更多受保护的端点。因此,它只允许在管理后台、登录页面和受保护的AJAX动作之外提供更多受保护的端点。

trans-unit.source: This filter is only fired when an endpoint is requested which is not already protected by WordPress core. As such, it exclusively allows providing further protected endpoints in addition to the admin backend, login pages and protected Ajax actions.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器只有在请求一个还没有被WordPress核心保护的端点时才会被触发,因此,它只允许在管理后台、登录页面和受保护的Ajax操作之外提供更多受保护的端点。因此,它专门允许在管理后台、登录页面和受保护的Ajax操作之外,提供更多受保护的端点。

trans-unit.source: This filter is only fired when doing AJAX and the AJAX request has an ‘action’ property.
trans-unit.target: 仅在执行AJAX且AJAX请求具有'action'属性时才会触发此过滤器。

trans-unit.source: This filter is only fired when doing Ajax and the Ajax request has an ‘action’ property.
trans-unit.target: 仅在执行Ajax且Ajax请求具有'action'属性时才触发此过滤器。

trans-unit.source: This filter is only run if the wordpress.org Serve Happy API considers the PHP version acceptable, ensuring that this filter can only make this check stricter, but not loosen it.
trans-unit.target: 只有在wordpress.org服务快乐API认为PHP版本可以接受的情况下,才会运行这个过滤器,确保这个过滤器只能让这个检查更加严格,而不能放松。

trans-unit.source: This filter is part of the function is_admin_bar_showing().
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器是is_admin_bar_showing（）函数的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This filter is used by the default “WordPress Widget: Categories” before it passes arguments to the wp_list_categories() function.
trans-unit.target: 默认的“ WordPress窗口小部件：类别”使用此过滤器，然后将参数传递给wp_list_categories（）函数。

trans-unit.source: This filter is used to filter the content of a post after it is retrieved from the database and before it is printed to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器用于在从数据库中获取帖子内容后,在将其打印到屏幕上之前对其进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: This filter may be useful for loading any of the TinyMCE core plugins, many of which are not included by default in WordPress, as well as any custom TinyMCE plugins you may want to create.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器可能对加载任何TinyMCE核心插件很有用,其中许多插件在WordPress中默认不包含,以及任何你可能想要创建的自定义TinyMCE插件。

trans-unit.source: This filter must be added before smilies_init is run, as it is normally only run once to setup the smilies regex.
trans-unit.target: 必须在运行 smilies_init 之前添加此过滤器，因为通常只运行一次以设置smilies regex。

trans-unit.source: This filter only applies to posts with post_type of ‘post’. For that filter which applies to custom post type look post_type_link.
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器仅适用于post_type为“ post”的帖子。对于适用于自定义帖子类型的过滤器，请查看post_type_link。

trans-unit.source: This filter only applies when resizing using the Imagick editor since GD always strips profiles by default.
trans-unit.target: 此滤镜仅适用于使用Imagick编辑器调整大小时,因为GD默认总是剥离配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This filter overrides a normal page request if it’s made by an admin through the AJAX call with the right query argument to check for this.
trans-unit.target: 如果管理员通过AJAX调用使用正确的查询参数进行检查，则此过滤器会覆盖普通的页面请求。

trans-unit.source: This filter overrides a standard page request if it’s made by an admin through the Ajax call with the right query argument to check for this.
trans-unit.target: 如果管理员通过Ajax调用使用正确的查询参数进行检查，则此过滤器将覆盖标准页面请求。

trans-unit.source: This filter registers the collection parameter, but does not map the collection parameter to an internal WP_Comment_Query parameter. Use the rest_comment_query filter to set WP_Comment_Query parameters.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器注册收集参数，但不将收集参数映射到内部WP_Comment_Query参数。使用 rest_comment_query 过滤器设置WP_Comment_Query参数。

trans-unit.source: This filter registers the collection parameter, but does not map the collection parameter to an internal WP_Query parameter. Use the `rest_{$this->post_type}_query` filter to set WP_Query parameters.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器注册收集参数，但不将收集参数映射到内部WP_Query参数。使用“ rest _ {$ this-> post_type} _query”过滤器设置WP_Query参数。

trans-unit.source: This filter registers the collection parameter, but does not map the collection parameter to an internal WP_Term_Query parameter. Use the `rest_{$this->taxonomy}_query` filter to set WP_Term_Query parameters.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器注册收集参数，但不将收集参数映射到内部WP_Term_Query参数。使用“ rest _ {$ this-> taxonomy} _query”过滤器设置WP_Term_Query参数。

trans-unit.source: This filter registers the collection parameter, but does not map the collection parameter to an internal WP_User_Query parameter. Use the rest_user_query filter to set WP_User_Query arguments.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器注册收集参数，但不将收集参数映射到内部WP_User_Query参数。使用 rest_user_query 过滤器设置WP_User_Query参数。

trans-unit.source: This filter runs per nav item, vs providing a list of all nav elements at once.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器针对每个nav项目运行，而不是一次提供所有nav元素的列表。

trans-unit.source: This filter runs before it can be used by plugins. It is designed for non-web run-times. Returning false causes the WP_DEBUG and related constants to not be checked and the default PHP values for errors will be used unless you take care to update them yourself.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器将在插件可以使用之前运行。它是为非Web运行时设计的。返回false将导致不检查 WP_DEBUG 和相关常量，并且将使用错误的默认PHP值，除非您自己进行更新。

trans-unit.source: This filter runs before it can be used by plugins. It is designed for non-web run-times. Returning false causes the WP_DEBUG and related constants to not be checked and the default php values for errors will be used unless you take care to update them yourself.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器将在插件可以使用之前运行。它是为非Web运行时设计的。返回false将导致不检查 WP_DEBUG 和相关常量，并且将使用错误的默认php值，除非您自己进行更新。

trans-unit.source: This filter runs before it can be used by plugins. It is designed for non-web runtimes. If this filter returns true, maintenance mode will be active and the request will end. If false, the request will be allowed to continue processing even if maintenance mode should be active.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器在被插件使用之前就已经运行了。它是为非web运行时设计的。如果该过滤器返回true,维护模式将被激活,请求将结束。如果返回false,即使维护模式应该是激活的,请求也会被允许继续处理。

trans-unit.source: This filter should be used to add, not remove, mime types. To remove mime types, use the ‘upload_mimes’ filter.
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器应用于添加（而不是删除）mime类型。要删除mime类型，请使用“ upload_mimes”过滤器。

trans-unit.source: This filter was previously used to force URL rewriting for other servers, like nginx. Use the ‘got_url_rewrite’ filter in got_url_rewrite() instead.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器以前曾用于强制其他服务器（如nginx）重写URL。请改用got_url_rewrite（）中的“ got_url_rewrite”过滤器。

trans-unit.source: This flag is important for ensuring that calling get_children() on a childless comment will not trigger unneeded database queries.
trans-unit.target: 此标志对于确保在无子注释上调用 get_children() 不会触发不需要的数据库查询非常重要。

trans-unit.source: This function
trans-unit.target: 该功能

trans-unit.source: This function does not check if there is a relationship between the object (=post type) and the taxonomy (like post_tag, category or custom taxonomy). Because of that, any existing term will be paired with the object, whether or not there is a connection between the object and the taxonomy (of this particular term)!! ( Further information in german)
trans-unit.target: 该函数不检查对象（=帖子类型）和分类法（例如post_tag，类别或自定义分类法）之间是否存在关系。因此，任何现有术语都将与对象配对，无论对象与（此特定术语的）分类法之间是否存在联系！（德语更多信息）

trans-unit.source: This function MUST be called inside the body tag.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数必须在body标签内调用。

trans-unit.source: This function actually works by simply calling register_nav_menus() in the following way:
trans-unit.target: 该函数实际上可以通过以下方式简单地调用register_nav_menus（）来工作：

trans-unit.source: This function adds data to the cache if the cache key doesn’t already exist. If it does exist, the data is not added and the function returns
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存键尚不存在，则此功能会将数据添加到缓存中。如果确实存在，则不添加数据，并且该函数返回

trans-unit.source: This function adds or overwrites a taxonomy. It takes in a name, an object name that it affects, and an array of parameters. It does not return anything.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数添加或覆盖一个分类法。它接收一个名称、一个受其影响的对象名称和一个参数数组。它不返回任何东西。

trans-unit.source: This function affects users with Javascript disabled or pages without the comment-reply.js JavaScript loaded.
trans-unit.target: 该功能会影响Javascript被禁用的用户,或没有加载评论-回复.js的页面。

trans-unit.source: This function allows detection for any filter currently being executed (despite not being the most recent filter to fire, in the case of hooks called from hook callbacks) to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数允许检测任何当前正在执行的过滤器(尽管不是最近一次启动的过滤器,在钩子回调调用的钩子的情况下)被验证。

trans-unit.source: This function allows plugin and theme authors to more easily differentiate how they handle specific functionality between production and development sites in a standardized way.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能允许插件和主题作者更容易区分他们如何以标准化的方式处理生产和开发站点之间的特定功能。

trans-unit.source: This function also accepts an ID of an object to check against if the capability is a meta capability. Meta capabilities such as edit_post and edit_user are capabilities used by the map_meta_cap() function to map to primitive capabilities that a user or role has, such as edit_posts and edit_others_posts.
trans-unit.target: 此函数还接受对象的ID，以检查该功能是否为元功能。元功能（例如 edit_post 和 edit_user )是 map_meta_cap() 函数用于映射到用户或角色具有的原始功能（例如 edit_posts 和 edit_others_posts )的功能。

trans-unit.source: This function also accepts an ID of an object to map against if the capability is a meta capability. Meta capabilities such as edit_post and edit_user are capabilities used by this function to map to primitive capabilities that a user or role has, such as edit_posts and edit_others_posts.
trans-unit.target: 如果功能是元功能，则此函数还接受要映射的对象的ID。元功能（例如 edit_post 和 edit_user )是此功能使用的功能，用于映射到用户或角色具有的原始功能，例如 edit_posts 和 edit_others_posts 。

trans-unit.source: This function also detects the type of the IP address, returning either ‘4’ or ‘6’ to represent a IPv4 and IPv6 address respectively. This does not verify if the IP is a valid IP, only that it appears to be an IP address.
trans-unit.target: 此功能还检测IP地址的类型，返回“ 4”或“ 6”以分别表示IPv4和IPv6地址。这不会验证IP是否为有效IP，只会验证它似乎是IP地址。

trans-unit.source: This function also sanitizes a URL for use in a redirect.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数还可以对重定向中使用的URL进行消毒。

trans-unit.source: This function applies filters that can be hooked to perform specific sanitization procedures for the particular metadata type and key. Does not sanitize anything on its own. Custom filters must be hooked in to do the work. The filter hook tag has the form “sanitize_{$meta_type}_meta_{$meta_key}“.
trans-unit.target: 此功能应用了可以挂钩的过滤器，以针对特定的元数据类型和键执行特定的清理过程。不自行消毒任何东西。必须挂接自定义过滤器才能进行工作。过滤器挂钩标记的格式为“ sanitize_{$meta_type}_meta_{$meta_key} ”。

trans-unit.source: This function attempts to sanitize the username, and if it “passes”, the name is considered valid. For additional logic, you can use the ‘validate_username‘ hook.
trans-unit.target: 此函数尝试清除用户名，如果“通过”，则认为该名称有效。有关其他逻辑，可以使用“ validate_username ”钩子。

trans-unit.source: This function automatically adds another stylesheet with -rtl prefix, e.g. editor-style-rtl.css. If that file doesn’t exist, it is removed before adding the stylesheet(s) to TinyMCE. If an array of stylesheets is passed to add_editor_style(), RTL is only added for the first stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 此函数自动添加另一个带有-rtl前缀的样式表，例如editor-style-rtl.css。如果该文件不存在，则在将样式表添加到TinyMCE之前将其删除。如果将样式表数组传递给add_editor_style（），则仅为第一个样式表添加RTL。

trans-unit.source: This function automatically registers custom menu support for the theme therefore you do not need to call add_theme_support( 'menus' );
trans-unit.target: 此功能自动注册为主题，因此你的自定义菜单支持并不需要呼叫 add_theme_support( 'menus' );

trans-unit.source: This function automatically registers custom menu support for the theme, therefore you do not need to call add_theme_support( 'menus' );
trans-unit.target: 此功能会自动注册自定义菜单支持主题，因此你不会需要调用 add_theme_support( 'menus' );

trans-unit.source: This function by default only applies to <a> tags, however this can be modified by the 3rd param.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此功能仅适用于 <a> 标记，但是可以通过第三参数进行修改。

trans-unit.source: This function calls itself recursively.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数递归调用自己。

trans-unit.source: This function can also be used to add extra settings fields to the default WP settings pages like media or general. You can add them to an existing section, or use add_settings_section() to create a new section to add the fields to.
trans-unit.target: 此功能还可用于将额外的设置字段添加到默认的WP设置页面（如媒体或常规）。您可以将它们添加到现有节中，或使用add_settings_section（）创建一个新节以将字段添加到其中。

trans-unit.source: This function can be called safely without having to check the file extension or availability of the OPcache extension.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以安全地被调用,而不需要检查文件扩展名或OPcache扩展名的可用性。

trans-unit.source: This function can be fed long strings with URIs and email links and will convert them into clickable links. You are not limited to feeding it just the link text itself (see the long string in the example above).
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以输入带有URI和电子邮件链接的长字符串,并将它们转换为可点击的链接。你并不局限于只输入链接文本本身(见上面例子中的长字符串)。

trans-unit.source: This function can be replaced via plugins. If plugins do not redefine these functions, then this will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 该功能可以通过插件替换。如果插件没有重新定义这些功能，则将使用它。

trans-unit.source: This function can be replaced via plugins. If plugins do not redefine these functions, then this will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 该功能可以通过插件替换。如果插件没有重新定义这些功能，则将使用它。

trans-unit.source: This function can be replaced via plugins. If plugins do not redefine these functions, then this will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能可以通过插件来替换。如果插件没有重新定义这些函数,那么将使用这个函数来代替。

trans-unit.source: This function can be used to make WordPress aware of custom querystring variables. Generally, it’s used in combination with add_rewrite_rule() to create rewrite rules for pages with custom templates.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可用于使WordPress知道自定义查询字符串变量。通常，它与add_rewrite_rule（）结合使用以为具有自定义模板的页面创建重写规则。

trans-unit.source: This function can be used to regenerate thumbnail and intermediate sizes of the image after changes have been made on the Settings_Media_Screen but it does not check or delete intermediate sizes it previously created for the same image.
trans-unit.target: 在Settings_Media_Screen上进行更改后，此功能可用于重新生成图像的缩略图和中间尺寸，但不会检查或删除先前为同一图像创建的中间尺寸。

trans-unit.source: This function can be used with any post type, but it makes more sense with attachments.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能可以用在任何类型的帖子上,但对附件更有意义。

trans-unit.source: This function can be used within the loop to display the taxonomies for a post without specifying the Post ID. You can also use it outside the Loop to display the taxonomies for a specific post.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以在循环中使用,在不指定帖子ID的情况下显示帖子的分类标准。您也可以在循环外使用它来显示特定帖子的分类标准。

trans-unit.source: This function can be used within the loop. It will also return an array of the taxonomies with links to the taxonomy and name.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以在循环中使用。它还将返回一个带有分类法和名称链接的分类法数组。

trans-unit.source: This function can be useful when your arguments are already in an array, and/or when there are many arguments to pass. Just make sure that your arguments are in the proper order!
trans-unit.target: 当你的参数已经在一个数组中,和/或有很多参数要传递时,这个函数可以很有用。只要确保你的参数是按照正确的顺序排列就可以了。

trans-unit.source: This function can escape data in some situations where wp_kses() must strip the whole attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下， wp_kses() 必须剥离整个属性，此函数可以转义数据。

trans-unit.source: This function cannot be used on the front end of the site, it is only available when loading the administration screens.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不能在网站前端使用,只有在加载管理界面时才能使用。

trans-unit.source: This function checks against the Banned Email Domains list at wp-admin/network/settings.php. The check is only run on self-registrations; user creation at wp-admin/network/users.php bypasses this check.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能检查wp-admin/network/settings.php中的禁止邮件域名列表。这个检查只在自我注册时进行;在wp-admin/network/users.php中创建用户会绕过这个检查。

trans-unit.source: This function checks whether the ‘blogmeta’ database table exists. The result is saved as a setting for the main network, making it essentially a global setting. Subsequent requests will refer to this setting instead of running the query.
trans-unit.target: 该函数检查“ blogmeta”数据库表是否存在。结果保存为主网络的设置，从而使其成为全局设置。后续请求将引用此设置，而不是运行查询。

trans-unit.source: This function checks whether there are more posts available in the main WP_Query object to loop over. It calls have_posts() method on the global $wp_query object.
trans-unit.target: 此函数检查主WP_Query对象中是否还有更多帖子可循环显示。它在全局 $wp_query 对象上调用 have_posts() 方法。

trans-unit.source: This function complements the die() PHP function. The difference is that HTML will be displayed to the user. It is recommended to use this function only when the execution should not continue any further. It is not recommended to call this function very often, and try to handle as many errors as possible silently or more gracefully.
trans-unit.target: 该函数补充了 die() PHP函数。区别在于HTML将显示给用户。建议仅在不应再继续执行时才使用此功能。不建议经常调用此函数，并尝试以静默方式或更优雅地处理尽可能多的错误。

trans-unit.source: This function contains do_action() calls for post status transition action hooks. The order of the words in the function name might be confusing – it does not change the status of posts, it only calls actions that can be hooked into by plugin developers. Although this function is already called where needed by core functions, it may be useful when a plugin updates a post by directly interacting with the database, thereby bypassing the usual post status transition actions. For the actions to be effective, the new status, old status and post object must be passed.
trans-unit.target: 此函数包含do_action（）调用，用于后状态转换动作挂钩。函数名称中单词的顺序可能令人困惑–它不会更改帖子的状态，它仅调用可由插件开发人员挂接到的动作。尽管此功能已在核心功能需要的地方调用，但是当插件通过与数据库直接交互来更新帖子，从而绕过通常的帖子状态转换操作时，它可能会很有用。为了使操作有效，必须传递新状态，旧状态和发布对象。

trans-unit.source: This function creates a row in the wp_blogs table and returns the new blog’s ID. It is the first step in creating a new blog.
trans-unit.target: 此函数在wp_blogs表中创建一行，并返回新博客的ID。这是创建新博客的第一步。

trans-unit.source: This function creates a row in the wp_blogs table.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在wp_blogs表中创建一条记录。

trans-unit.source: This function detects conflicts of this type and resolves them in favor of the post permalink.
trans-unit.target: 该函数检测这种类型的冲突,并将其解决,以利于文章的permalink。

trans-unit.source: This function displays or returns the unescaped title of the current post. This tag may only be used within The Loop, to get the title of a post outside of the loop use get_the_title. If the post is protected or private, this will be noted by the words “Protected: ” or “Private: ” prepended to the title.
trans-unit.target: 此函数显示或返回当前帖子的未转义标题。此标记只能在The Loop中使用，要在循环之外获取帖子的标题，请使用get_the_title。如果帖子是受保护的或不公开的，将在标题前加上“受保护：”或“私人：”字样。

trans-unit.source: This function does a lot of work. It parses an attribute list into an array with attribute data, and tries to do the right thing even if it gets weird input. It will add quotes around attribute values that don’t have any quotes or apostrophes around them, to make it easier to produce HTML code that will conform to W3C’s HTML specification. It will also remove bad URL protocols from attribute values. It also reduces duplicate attributes by using the attribute defined first (foo='bar' foo='baz' will result in foo='bar').
trans-unit.target: 这个功能做了很多工作。它将属性列表解析为带有属性数据的数组，并尝试做正确的事情，即使它得到了奇怪的输入。它将在属性值周围添加引号，而属性值周围没有引号或撇号，以使其更易于生成符合W3C HTML规范的HTML代码。还将从属性值中删除不良的URL协议。它还通过使用首先定义的属性来减少重复的属性（ foo='bar' foo='baz' 将导致 foo='bar' ）。

trans-unit.source: This function does not accept any parameters. Instead, it automatically compares the $wp_query object (i.e., the “current query”) with the $wp_the_query object (the “main query”)
trans-unit.target: 该函数不接受任何参数。相反，它会自动比较$ wp_query对象（即“当前查询”）和 $wp_the_query 对象（“主查询”）

trans-unit.source: This function does not appear to be used anymore or does not appear to be needed. It might be a legacy function left over from when there was a need for updating the category cache.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能似乎不再使用或似乎不需要了。这可能是需要更新类别缓存时留下的遗留功能。

trans-unit.source: This function does not apply the sanitize_title filter to the title.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不将sanitize_title过滤器应用于标题。

trans-unit.source: This function does not display anything; you should access the objects and then echo or otherwise use the desired member variables.
trans-unit.target: 该函数不显示任何内容;你应该访问对象,然后呼应或以其他方式使用所需的成员变量。

trans-unit.source: This function does not do anything except transition the post status. If you want to ensure post_name is set, use wp_update_post() instead.
trans-unit.target: 该功能除了转换帖子状态外不执行任何操作。如果要确保设置了post_name，请改用wp_update_post（）。

trans-unit.source: This function does not replace special accented characters.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不替换特殊重音字符。

trans-unit.source: This function does not return a value. The HTML for the button is output directly to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 此函数不返回值。按钮的HTML直接输出到浏览器。

trans-unit.source: This function ensures the user intends to perform a given action, which helps protect against clickjacking style attacks. It verifies intent, not authorisation, therefore it does not verify the user’s capabilities. This should be performed with current_user_can() or similar.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可确保用户打算执行给定的操作，从而有助于防止点击劫持风格的攻击。它验证意图而不是授权，因此不验证用户的能力。这应该使用 current_user_can() 或类似方法执行。

trans-unit.source: This function essentially the same as add_option() but works network wide when using WP Multisite.
trans-unit.target: 此函数与add_option（）基本相同，但在使用WP Multisite时可在整个网络范围内工作。

trans-unit.source: This function executes the
trans-unit.target: 该函数执行

trans-unit.source: This function exists to provide a shortlink tag that all themes and plugins can target. A plugin must hook in to provide the actual shortlinks. Default shortlink support is limited to providing ?p= style links for posts. Plugins can short-circuit this function via the ‘pre_get_shortlink’ filter or filter the output via the ‘get_shortlink’ filter.
trans-unit.target: 存在此功能是为了提供所有主题和插件都可以定位的shortlink标签。插件必须挂接才能提供实际的短链接。默认的短链接支持仅限于为帖子提供？p =样式链接。插件可以通过短路此功能“pre_get_shortlink”过滤器或过滤经由输出“get_shortlink”的过滤器。

trans-unit.source: This function expects slashed data.
trans-unit.target: 该函数期望使用斜线数据。

trans-unit.source: This function expects unslashed data, as opposed to functions such as wp_new_comment() which expect slashed data.
trans-unit.target: 该函数期望使用不带斜线的数据，而 wp_new_comment() 之类的函数则要求不带斜线的数据。

trans-unit.source: This function expects unslashed data.
trans-unit.target: 该函数期望使用非斜线数据。

trans-unit.source: This function fires twice: in wp-settings.php before plugins are loaded (for backward compatibility reasons), and again on the ‘init’ action. We must avoid registering rewrite rules before the ‘init’ action.
trans-unit.target: 此函数触发两次：在插件加载之前（出于向后兼容性原因）在wp-settings.php中，以及在“ init”操作中再次触发。我们必须避免在“ init”操作之前注册重写规则。

trans-unit.source: This function generates a token and stores it with the associated expiration time (and potentially other session information via the ‘attach_session_information’ filter).
trans-unit.target: 该函数生成令牌并将其与相关的到期时间（以及可能通过“ attach_session_information”过滤器发送的其他会话信息）一起存储。

trans-unit.source: This function generates metadata for an image attachment. It also creates a thumbnail and other intermediate sizes of the image attachment based on the sizes defined on the Settings_Media_Screen.
trans-unit.target: 此功能生成图像附件的元数据。它还根据Settings_Media_Screen上定义的大小创建图像附件的缩略图和其他中间大小。

trans-unit.source: This function gets the path to a plugin file or directory, relative to the plugins directory, without the leading and trailing slashes.
trans-unit.target: 此函数获取一个插件文件或目录的路径,相对于插件目录而言,不含前导和尾部的斜线。

trans-unit.source: This function gives the body element different classes and can be added, typically, in the header.php’s HTML body tag.
trans-unit.target: 此函数为body元素提供了不同的类，通常可以将其添加到header.php的HTML body标签中。

trans-unit.target: 此函数是get_permalink（）的别名。
