trans-unit.source: This function is an alias to remove_filter().
trans-unit.target: 此函数是remove_filter（）的别名。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by add_metadata() and update_metadata() WordPress functions.
trans-unit.target: 该函数的调用add_metadata（）和update_metadata（） WordPress的功能。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by maybe_add_existing_user_to_blog() and should not be called directly. This page is for informational purposes only. Use add_user_to_blog().
trans-unit.target: 该函数由 maybe_add_existing_user_to_blog() 调用，不应直接调用。此页面仅供参考。使用 add_user_to_blog() 。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the do_action_deprecated() and apply_filters_deprecated() functions, and so generally does not need to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 此函数由do_action_deprecated（）和apply_filters_deprecated（）函数调用，因此通常不需要直接调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called first to make the request and there are other API functions to abstract out the above convoluted setup.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数首先被调用来进行请求,还有其他的API函数来抽象出上述复杂的设置。

trans-unit.source: This function is deprecated and should no longer be extended as it won’t be used anywhere in WordPress. Also, plugins shouldn’t use it either.
trans-unit.target: 此功能已被弃用，不应再扩展，因为它将不会在WordPress中的任何地方使用。另外，插件也不应该使用它。

trans-unit.source: This function is deprecated. Use wp_cache_switch_to_blog() instead of this function when preparing the cache for a blog switch. For clearing the cache during unit tests, consider using wp_cache_init(). wp_cache_init() is not recommended outside of unit tests as the performance penalty for using it is high.
trans-unit.target: 不推荐使用此功能。在为博客切换准备缓存时，请使用wp_cache_switch_to_blog（）代替此函数。为了在单元测试期间清除缓存，请考虑使用wp_cache_init（）。不建议在单元测试之外使用wp_cache_init（），因为使用它会降低性能。

trans-unit.source: This function is designed to enhance Walker::display_element() to display children of higher nesting levels than selected inline on the highest depth level displayed. This prevents them being orphaned at the end of the comment list.
trans-unit.target: 此功能旨在增强Walker :: display_element（）来显示嵌套级别比在显示的最高深度级别上选定的嵌入式行更高的子级。这样可以防止它们在评论列表的末尾成为孤立的。

trans-unit.source: This function is designed to work with or without a logged-in user. In terms of security, plugin developers should check the current user’s capabilities before updating any options.
trans-unit.target: 此功能旨在与有或没有登录用户一起使用。在安全性方面，插件开发人员应在更新任何选项之前检查当前用户的功能。

trans-unit.source: This function is ideal when the HTTP request is being made to an arbitrary URL. The URL is validated to avoid redirection and request forgery attacks.
trans-unit.target: 当HTTP请求被发送到一个任意的URL时,这个功能是理想的。对URL进行验证以避免重定向和请求伪造攻击。

trans-unit.source: This function is localized. For languages that count ‘words’ by the individual character (such as East Asian languages), the $num_words argument will apply to the number of individual characters.
trans-unit.target: 此功能已本地化。对于按单个字符计数“单词”的语言（例如东亚语言），$ num_words参数将适用于单个字符的数量。

trans-unit.source: This function is most commonly used within hooks to distinguish WordPress’ main query (for a page, post, or archive) from a custom/secondary query.
trans-unit.target: 该函数最常在钩子内使用，以区分WordPress的主要查询（针对页面，帖子或档案）与自定义/辅助查询。

trans-unit.source: This function is no longer marked as "private".
trans-unit.target: 该功能不再标记为 "私有"。

trans-unit.source: This function is normally called when a user resets a lost password, not if the password is changed on their profile page.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数通常在用户重置丢失的密码时被调用,而不是在用户的个人资料页面上更改密码时被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is normally used directly below <div id="respond"> and before the comment form.
trans-unit.target: 此功能通常直接在 <div id="respond"> 和注释表单之前使用。

trans-unit.source: This function is normally used when a user is registering, to ensure that the E-mail address the user is attempting to register with has not already been registered.
trans-unit.target: 该功能通常在用户注册时使用,以确保用户试图注册的E-mail地址尚未被注册。

trans-unit.source: This function is not safe to use for displaying the URL, use esc_url() instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用此函数显示URL并不安全，请改用esc_url（）。

trans-unit.source: This function is not used for all WP pages due to bugs and performance issues. This function doesn’t use an HTML parser but some potentially expensive regular expressions. This function shall only be used if the length of the excerpt can be controlled; otherwise memory issues or some obscure bugs can occur.
trans-unit.target: 由于错误和性能问题，并非所有WP页面都使用此功能。该函数不使用HTML解析器，而是使用一些潜在的昂贵正则表达式。仅在可以控制摘录长度的情况下，才应使用此功能。否则会发生内存问题或一些难以理解的错误。

trans-unit.source: This function is often used by a plugin to deactivate itself if the plugin requires the presence of certain features that are missing in environment after an administrator has activated it. This is usually the last step in a dependency-checking function.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能经常被插件用来停用,如果管理员激活插件后,插件需要存在某些环境中缺少的功能,那么这个功能就会被停用。这通常是依赖性检查函数的最后一步。

trans-unit.source: This function is only needed when the existing installation is older than 3.4.0.
trans-unit.target: 只有当现有的安装版本大于3.4.0时才需要此功能。

trans-unit.source: This function is only run for control types that have been registered with WP_Customize_Manager::register_control_type().
trans-unit.target: 仅对于已通过WP_Customize_Manager :: register_control_type（）注册的控件类型运行此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is only run for panel types that have been registered with WP_Customize_Manager::register_panel_type().
trans-unit.target: 此功能仅对已通过WP_Customize_Manager :: register_panel_type（）注册的面板类型运行。

trans-unit.source: This function is only run for section types that have been registered with WP_Customize_Manager::register_section_type().
trans-unit.target: 此功能仅对已通过WP_Customize_Manager :: register_section_type（）注册的节类型运行。

trans-unit.source: This function is pluggable using the following filters:
trans-unit.target: 该功能可使用以下过滤器进行插拔。

trans-unit.source: This function is primarily used by themes which want to hardcode the search form into the sidebar and also by the search widget in WordPress.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能主要被那些想把搜索表单硬编码到侧边栏的主题和WordPress中的搜索小部件所使用。

trans-unit.source: This function is similar to get_post(), except that it can retrieve a post from any site on the network, not just the current site.
trans-unit.target: 此函数类似于get_post（），除了它可以从网络上的任何站点（而不仅仅是当前站点）检索帖子。

trans-unit.source: This function is simple, it clears all of the shortcode tags by replacing the shortcodes global by a empty array. This is actually a very efficient method for removing all shortcodes.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数很简单,它通过将短码全局替换为一个空数组来清除所有的短码标签。这其实是一个非常有效的删除所有短码的方法。

trans-unit.source: This function is to be used after wp_get_update_php_url() to display a consistent annotation if the web host has altered the default "Update PHP" page URL.
trans-unit.target: 如果Web主机已更改默认的“更新PHP”页面URL，则在wp_get_update_php_url（）之后使用此函数来显示一致的注释。

trans-unit.source: This function is to be used after wp_get_update_php_url() to return a consistent annotation if the web host has altered the default "Update PHP" page URL.
trans-unit.target: 如果Web主机已更改默认的“更新PHP”页面URL，则在wp_get_update_php_url（）之后使用此函数以返回一致的注释。

trans-unit.source: This function is to be used in every PHP4 style constructor method that is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数将被用于每一个PHP4风格的构造函数中,而这些方法已经被废弃。

trans-unit.source: This function is to be used in every file that is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数要在每一个被废弃的文件中使用。

trans-unit.source: This function is to be used in every function that is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数要用在每一个被废弃的函数中。

trans-unit.source: This function is used by the pluggable functions wp_get_current_user() and get_currentuserinfo(), the latter of which is deprecated but used for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 此功能由可插拔函数wp_get_current_user（）和get_currentuserinfo（）使用，后者已被弃用，但用于向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: This function is used in the short post excerpt list, to prevent unmatched elements. For example, it makes
trans-unit.target: 这个函数用于短帖摘录列表中,防止不匹配的元素。例如,它使

trans-unit.source: This function is used internally by wp_list_bookmarks() and should not be used by themes.
trans-unit.target: 此函数由wp_list_bookmarks（）在内部使用，并且不应由主题使用。

trans-unit.source: This function is used internally for apply_filters(), do_action(), and do_action_ref_array() and is not meant to be used from outside those functions. This function does not check for the existence of the all hook, so it will fail unless the all hook exists prior to this function call.
trans-unit.target: 该函数在内部用于apply_filters（），do_action（）和do_action_ref_array（），并不打算从这些函数外部使用。该函数不会检查all钩子的存在，因此它将失败，除非在该函数调用之前存在all钩子。

trans-unit.source: This function is used throughout WordPress to allow for both string or array to be merged into another array.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能在整个WordPress中使用,允许将字符串或数组合并到另一个数组中。

trans-unit.source: This function is used to detect if this is a possible cause of the validation error, so that if it is, a notification may be added to the Validation Errors.
trans-unit.target: 该功能用于检测是否是验证错误的可能原因,如果是,可以在验证错误中添加通知。

trans-unit.source: This function is used to display a confirmation on the Multisite Users administration panel before deleting users.
trans-unit.target: 在删除用户之前,在多站点用户管理面板上显示确认。

trans-unit.source: This function is used to work around certain ACL issues in PHP primarily affecting Windows Servers.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数用于解决PHP中的某些ACL问题,主要影响Windows服务器。

trans-unit.source: This function is used when user registration is open but new site registration is not.
trans-unit.target: 当用户注册开放,但新站注册未开放时使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: This function is useful if you need to pull posts, or other information, from other blogs. You can switch back afterwards using restore_current_blog().
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要从其他博客中获取帖子或其他信息，此功能很有用。之后，您可以使用restore_current_blog（）切换回去。

trans-unit.source: This function is useful when used with custom post types as it allows for automatic flushing of the WordPress rewrite rules (usually needs to be done manually for new custom post types). However, this is an expensive operation so it should only be used when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 与自定义帖子类型一起使用时，此功能很有用，因为它允许自动刷新WordPress重写规则（对于新的自定义帖子类型，通常需要手动完成）。但是，这是一项昂贵的操作，因此仅应在必要时使用。

trans-unit.source: This function localizes a registered script with data for a JavaScript variable.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将注册的脚本与JavaScript变量的数据本地化。

trans-unit.source: This function makes sure that only the allowed HTML element names, attribute names, attribute values, and HTML entities will occur in the given text string.
trans-unit.target: 该函数确保只有允许的HTML元素名、属性名、属性值和HTML实体才会出现在给定的文本字符串中。

trans-unit.source: This function must reside in a file included only if is_multisite() due to legacy function_exists() checks to determine if multisite is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 由于遗留的function_exists（）检查是否启用了多站点，因此此函数必须仅驻留在is_multisite（）包含的文件中。

trans-unit.source: This function normalizes HTML entities. It will convert AT&T to the correct AT&T, : to :, &#XYZZY; to &#XYZZY; and so on.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可标准化HTML实体。它会转换成 AT&T 以正确的 AT&T 公司， : 到 : ， &#XYZZY; 到 &#XYZZY; 等等。

trans-unit.source: This function not run if $_wp_suspend_cache_invalidation is not empty. See wp_suspend_cache_invalidation().
trans-unit.target: 如果$ _wp_suspend_cache_invalidation不为空，则此函数不运行。请参阅wp_suspend_cache_invalidation（）。

trans-unit.source: This function outputs all metaboxes registered to a specific page and context. Meta boxes should be registered using the add_meta_box() function.
trans-unit.target: 此功能输出所有注册到特定页面和上下文的元框。应使用add_meta_box（）函数注册元框。

trans-unit.source: This function overrides the mbstring encoding to a binary-safe encoding, and resets it to the users expected encoding afterwards through the reset_mbstring_encoding function.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将mbstring编码覆盖为二进制安全编码，然后通过 reset_mbstring_encoding 函数将其重置为用户期望的编码。

trans-unit.source: This function performs a series of checks to ensure the environment allows for the safe upgrading of global WordPress database tables. It is necessary because global tables will commonly grow to millions of rows on large installations, and the ability to control their upgrade routines can be critical to the operation of large networks.
trans-unit.target: 该功能执行一系列检查,以确保环境允许全局WordPress数据库表的安全升级。这是很有必要的,因为在大型安装中,全局表通常会增长到数百万行,控制其升级程序的能力对于大型网络的运行至关重要。

trans-unit.source: This function prevents the current user from registering a new site with a blogname equivalent to another user’s login name. Passing the $user parameter to the function, where $user is the other user, is effectively an override of this limitation.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可防止当前用户使用与另一个用户的登录名相同的博客名注册新站点。将$ user参数传递给该函数（其中$ user是另一个用户）实际上是对该限制的覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This function prints a link to the next set of posts within the current query.
trans-unit.target: 该函数打印当前查询中的下一组帖子的链接。

trans-unit.source: This function provides a standardized way to appropriately select on the post_status of a post type. The function will return a piece of SQL code that can be added to a WHERE clause; this SQL is constructed to allow all published posts, and all private posts to which the user has access.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数提供了一个标准化的方法来适当地选择post_status的类型。该函数将返回一段SQL代码,可以添加到WHERE子句中;该SQL的构造是允许所有发布的帖子,以及所有用户有权限的私人帖子。

trans-unit.source: This function provides an efficient method of finding the amount of post’s type a blog has. Another method is to count the amount of items in get_posts(), but that method has a lot of overhead with doing so. Therefore, when developing for 2.5+, use this function instead.
trans-unit.target: 此功能提供了一种有效的方法来查找博客具有的帖子类型。另一种方法是计算get_posts（）中的项目数量，但是这样做有很多开销。因此，在为2.5+开发时，请改用此功能。

trans-unit.source: This function relies on the use of
trans-unit.target: 这个功能依赖于使用

trans-unit.source: This function relies upon the global $wp_query object to be set – this is usually the case from within The Loop.
trans-unit.target: 此函数依赖于要设置的全局 $wp_query 对象–通常在The Loop内部就是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: This function removes a function attached to a specified action hook. This method can be used to remove default functions attached to a specific filter hook and possibly replace them with a substitute.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以删除附加在指定动作钩子上的函数。本方法可以用来删除附加在特定过滤钩子上的默认函数,并可能用一个替代函数来代替它们。

trans-unit.source: This function removes a function attached to a specified filter hook. This method can be used to remove default functions attached to a specific filter hook and possibly replace them with a substitute.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以删除附加在指定过滤钩子上的函数。本方法可以用来删除附加在特定过滤钩子上的默认函数,并可能用替代函数代替。

trans-unit.source: This function removes all error messages associated with the specified error code, along with any error data for that code.
trans-unit.target: 该函数删除与指定错误代码相关联的所有错误信息,以及该代码的任何错误数据。

trans-unit.source: This function removes all non-allowed protocols from the beginning of the string. It ignores whitespace and the case of the letters, and it does understand HTML entities. It does its work recursively, so it won’t be fooled by a string like javascript:javascript:alert(57).
trans-unit.target: 此函数从字符串的开头删除所有不允许的协议。它忽略空格和字母大小写，并且确实了解HTML实体。它的工作是递归的，因此不会被 javascript:javascript:alert(57) 之类的字符串所欺骗。

trans-unit.source: This function removes an item from the Toolbar. Toolbar items are also called “nodes”.
trans-unit.target: 此功能从工具栏中删除一个项目。工具栏项也称为“节点”。

trans-unit.source: This function resets global variables based on the names passed in the $vars array to the value of $_POST[$var] or $_GET[$var] or ” if neither is defined.
trans-unit.target: 此函数根据$ vars数组中传递的名称将全局变量重置为$ _POST [$ var]或$ _GET [$ var]或“”（如果未定义）的值。

trans-unit.source: This function retrieves the absolute URL to the plugins or mu-plugins directory (without the trailing slash) or, when using the
trans-unit.target: 这个函数检索到插件或mu-plugins目录的绝对URL(没有尾部的斜线),或者当使用

trans-unit.source: This function retrieves the directory name of the current theme, without the trailing slash. In the case a child theme is being used, the directory name of the parent theme will be returned. Use get_stylesheet() to get the directory name of the child theme.
trans-unit.target: 此函数检索当前主题的目录名称，不带斜杠。如果使用子主题，则将返回父主题的目录名称。使用get_stylesheet（）获取子主题的目录名称。

trans-unit.source: This function returns
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回

trans-unit.source: This function returns a Toolbar object with all the properties of a single Toolbar item. Toolbar items are also called “nodes”.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回具有单个工具栏项的所有属性的工具栏对象。工具栏项也称为“节点”。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a list of all HTML attributes that must contain a URL according to the HTML specification.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回所有HTML属性的列表,根据HTML规范,这些属性必须包含一个URL。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a properly-formed URI; in other words, it will be a web-address (starting with http:// or https:// for SSL). As such, it is most appropriately used for links, referencing additional stylesheets, or probably most commonly, images.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回一个正确格式的URI;换句话说,它将是一个网络地址(以http://或 https://为开头的SSL)。因此,它最适合用于链接,引用额外的样式表,或者可能是最常见的图片。

trans-unit.source: This function returns an array of objects, one object for each tag assigned to the post. If this function is used in The Loop, then no ID need be passed.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回一个对象数组，每个对象分配给帖子一个标签。如果在The Loop中使用此函数，则无需传递任何ID。

trans-unit.source: This function returns array of attachment metadata in the format required by wp_update_attachment_metadata(). The elements returned in the array are:
trans-unit.target: 此函数以wp_update_attachment_metadata（）所需的格式返回附件元数据数组。数组中返回的元素是：

trans-unit.source: This function returns posts in an associative array (
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回一个关联数组中的帖子(

trans-unit.source: This function runs when a user self-registers a new site as well as when a Super Admin creates a new site. Hook to ‘wpmu_new_blog’ for events that should affect all new sites.
trans-unit.target: 当用户自行注册新站点以及超级管理员创建新站点时，此功能将运行。钩到“ wpmu_new_blog”，了解可能影响所有新站点的事件。

trans-unit.source: This function runs when a user self-registers as well as when a Super Admin creates a new user. Hook to ‘wpmu_new_user’ for events that should affect all new users, but only on Multisite (otherwise use {@see’user_register’}).
trans-unit.target: 当用户自行注册以及超级管理员创建新用户时，将运行此功能。钩“wpmu_new_user”对于应该影响所有新用户的事件，但只有在多站点（以其它方式使用{@ see'user_register'}）。

trans-unit.source: This function searches for URL protocols at the beginning of the string, while handling whitespace and HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: 该函数在字符串的开头搜索URL协议,同时处理空格和HTML实体。

trans-unit.source: This function sends headers to the page. It must be run before any content is returned.
trans-unit.target: 该函数向页面发送头信息。在返回任何内容之前,必须运行该函数。

trans-unit.source: This function sets an authentication cookie. Users will not be logged in if it is not sent.
trans-unit.target: 此功能设置验证cookie。如果没有发送,用户将无法登录。

trans-unit.source: This function should be called immediately upon plugin load or placed in the theme’s
trans-unit.target: 插件加载后应立即调用此函数，或将其放置在主题的

trans-unit.source: This function should be overridden by the sub-classes. For example MO/PO can derive the logic from their headers.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数应该被子类重写。例如MO/PO可以从它们的头部导出逻辑。

trans-unit.source: This function should be overridden by the subclasses. For example MO/PO can derive the logic from their headers.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数应该被子类重写。例如MO/PO可以从它们的头文件中导出逻辑。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used in form() methods to create id attributes for fields to be saved by WP_Widget::update().
trans-unit.target: 该函数应在form（）方法中使用，以为将由WP_Widget :: update（）保存的字段创建id属性。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used in form() methods to create name attributes for fields to be saved by update()
trans-unit.target: 这个函数应该在form()方法中使用,为要通过update()保存的字段创建名称属性。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used only to enable showing of errors. wpdb::hide_errors() should be used instead for hiding errors.
trans-unit.target: 此功能应仅用于启用错误显示。应该使用wpdb :: hide_errors（）来隐藏错误。

trans-unit.source: This function should be used only to enable showing of errors. wpdb::hide_errors() should be used instead for hiding of errors. However, this function can be used to enable and disable showing of database errors.
trans-unit.target: 此功能应仅用于启用错误显示。应该使用wpdb :: hide_errors（）来隐藏错误。但是，此功能可用于启用和禁用数据库错误的显示。

trans-unit.source: This function should check that $new_instance is set correctly. The newly-calculated value of $instance should be returned. If false is returned, the instance won’t be saved/updated.
trans-unit.target: 此函数应检查 $new_instance 的设置是否正确。 $instance 的新计算值应返回。如果返回false，则不会保存/更新实例。

trans-unit.source: This function should normally be hooked in with one of the the admin_menu actions depending on the menu where the sub menu is to appear:
trans-unit.target: 通常应根据子菜单所在的菜单使用admin_menu操作之一来挂接此功能：

trans-unit.source: This function should not be called directly, use unzip_file() instead.
trans-unit.target: 不应直接调用此函数，而应使用 unzip_file() 。

trans-unit.source: This function should probably also only be used for sites that do not support oEmbed.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能可能也应该只用于不支持oEmbed的网站。

trans-unit.source: This function simply returns the object, as before. The bootstrap takes care of setting site_name.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只是简单地返回对象,和之前一样。Bootstrap负责设置site_name。

trans-unit.source: This function takes a ‘capability’ (see Roles and Capabilities) which will be used to determine whether or not a page is included in the menu. The function which is hooked in to handle the output of the page must check that the user has the required ‘capability’ as well.
trans-unit.target: 此功能具有“功能”（请参阅​​“ 角色和功能”），该功能将用于确定菜单中是否包含页面。挂钩处理页面输出的功能必须检查用户是否也具有所需的“功能”。

trans-unit.source: This function takes a capability which will be used to determine whether or not a page is included in the menu.
trans-unit.target: 该函数接收一个能力,该能力将被用来决定一个页面是否包含在菜单中。

trans-unit.source: This function upgrades the Cron info array to version 2.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将Cron信息数组升级到第2版。

trans-unit.source: This function uses a smaller allowable character set than the set defined by RFC 5322. Some legal email addresses may be changed.
trans-unit.target: 此功能使用的允许字符集比RFC 5322定义的字符集小。某些合法的电子邮件地址可能会更改。

trans-unit.source: This function uses two hard-coded lists of elements for single tags and nestable tags. WordPress uses multiple such lists and the lists not kept in sync. If an element isn’t part of these lists or changed its nesting behavior, it may lead to incorrect markup.
trans-unit.target: 此功能对单个标签和可嵌套标签使用两个元素的硬编码列表。WordPress使用多个此类列表，并且这些列表不保持同步。如果元素不属于这些列表或更改其嵌套行为，则可能导致错误的标记。

trans-unit.source: This function was added for the taxonomy support to update the new category structure with the old category one. This will maintain compatibility with plugins and themes which depend on the old key or property names.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是为支持分类学而添加的,以更新新的分类结构和旧的分类结构。这将保持与依赖旧键或属性名称的插件和主题的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: This function was added in PHP 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 该功能在PHP 5.6中被添加。

trans-unit.source: This function was added in PHP 5.6. However, the Hash extension may be explicitly disabled on select servers. As of PHP 7.4.0, the Hash extension is a core PHP extension and can no longer be disabled. I.e. when PHP 7.4.0 becomes the minimum requirement, this polyfill can be safely removed.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是在PHP 5.6中添加的。然而,Hash 扩展可以在选定的服务器上被明确禁止。从 PHP 7.4.0 开始,Hash 扩展是 PHP 的核心扩展,不能再被禁用。也就是说,当 PHP 7.4.0 成为最低要求时,可以安全地删除这个 polyfill。

trans-unit.source: This function was backported from 2.5.0 to 2.3.2. Regex callback for make_clickable().
trans-unit.target: 该功能从2.5.0移植到2.3.2。make_clickable（）的正则表达式回调。

trans-unit.source: This function was backported to WordPress 2.3.2, but originally was added in WordPress 2.5.0.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能被移植到WordPress 2.3.2,但最初是在WordPress 2.5.0中添加的。

trans-unit.source: This function was formerly just an alias for $wpdb->escape(), but that function has now been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 该函数以前只是 $wpdb->escape() 的别名，但是现在不推荐使用该函数。

trans-unit.source: This function was moved from wp-admin/includes/ms.php so it's no longer Multisite specific.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从wp-admin/includes/ms.php中移出,所以它不再是多站点专用的。

trans-unit.source: This function will also affect the display of the Toolbar in the dashboard for WordPress versions prior to Version 3.3.
trans-unit.target: 对于3.3版之前的WordPress版本，此功能还会影响仪表板中工具栏的显示。

trans-unit.source: This function will always return the first term that matches the $field– $value–$taxonomy combination specified in the parameters. If your query is likely to match more than one term (as is likely to be the case when $field is ‘name’, for example), consider using get_terms() instead; that way, you will get all matching terms, and can provide your own logic for deciding which one was intended.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将始终返回与参数中指定的 $field – $value – $taxonomy 组合匹配的第一项。如果您的查询可能匹配多个术语（例如，当 $field 为'name'时，可能会匹配），请考虑使用get_terms（）代替；这样，您将获得所有匹配的术语，并可以提供自己的逻辑来确定要使用的术语。

trans-unit.source: This function will check whether or not a given email address (
trans-unit.target: 该函数将检查给定的电子邮件地址是否 (

trans-unit.source: This function will include the chosen transport and attempt connecting.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将包括所选择的传输并尝试连接。

trans-unit.source: This function will not URL encode the URL. If you have attachments with invalid characters in their name, you should raw URL encode the output of this function in order to have a valid URL.
trans-unit.target: 本函数不会对URL进行编码。如果您的附件名称中含有无效字符,您应该对该函数的输出进行原始URL编码,以获得有效的URL。

trans-unit.source: This function will not move an uploaded file to the upload folder. It will create a new file with the content in $bits parameter. If you move the upload file, read the content of the uploaded file, and then you can give the filename and content to this function, which will add it to the upload folder.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数不会将上传的文件移动到upload文件夹,而是在参数$bits中创建一个新的文件。它将用$bits参数中的内容创建一个新文件。如果你移动了上传文件,读取上传文件的内容,然后你就可以把文件名和内容给这个函数,这个函数会把它添加到上传文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: This function will not resize your existing featured images. To regenerate existing images in the new size, use the Regenerate Thumbnails plugin.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不会调整现有特色图像的尺寸。要以新大小重新生成现有图像，请使用“重新生成缩略图”插件。

trans-unit.source: This function will not run if $_wp_suspend_cache_invalidation is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果$_wp_suspend_cache_invalidation不是空的,这个函数将不会运行。

trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下,该功能将无法工作(无声无息地失败)。

trans-unit.target: 无论是否配置了“漂亮”的永久链接，此函数都将返回“ slug”样式的URI 。

trans-unit.source: This function will return true only on the page you set as the "Privacy Policy page".
trans-unit.target: 该函数仅在您设置为 "隐私政策页面 "的页面上返回true。

trans-unit.source: This function will update the options for theme mods which were created in older WordPress versions that used the deprecated mods_$theme_name option key to now use theme_mod_$name.
trans-unit.target: 此功能将更新在旧WordPress版本中创建的主题mod的选项，这些主题使用不推荐使用的mods_ $ theme_name选项键现在使用theme_mod_ $ name。

trans-unit.source: This has to be called after the data is pulled from the cache, because the cached events are shared by all users. trans-unit.source: This hook is called during each page load, after the theme is initialized. It is generally used to perform basic setup, registration, and init actions for a theme.

trans-unit.source: This hook is called when an attachment created by wp_insert_attachment() in
trans-unit.target: 当wp_insert_attachment（）在

trans-unit.source: This hook is especially useful when developing custom pagination. For instance, if you are declaring a custom offset value in your queries, WordPress will NOT deduct the offset from the the $wp_query->found_posts parameter (for example, if you have 45 usable posts after an offset of 10, WordPress will ignore the offset and still give found_posts a value of 55).
trans-unit.target: 在开发自定义分页时，此钩子特别有用。例如，如果您在查询中声明自定义偏移量值，则WordPress不会从$ wp_query-> found_posts参数中扣除偏移量（例如，如果偏移量为10后有45个可用帖子，则WordPress将忽略该偏移量）偏移量，仍将found_posts的值设为55）。

trans-unit.source: This hook is fired once WP, all plugins, and the theme are fully loaded and instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 一旦WP、所有插件和主题被完全加载和实例化,这个钩子就会被触发。

trans-unit.source: This hook is for admin only and can’t be used to add anything on the front end.
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩仅供管理员使用，不能用于在前端添加任何内容。

trans-unit.source: This hook is functionally the same as wp_ajax_{$action}, except the “nopriv” variant is used for handling AJAX requests from unauthenticated users, i.e. when is_user_logged_in() returns false.
trans-unit.target: 该钩子与wp_ajax _ {$ action}在功能上相同，除了“ nopriv”变体用于处理来自未经身份验证的用户的AJAX请求，即is_user_logged_in（）返回false。

trans-unit.source: This hook is one effective place to perform any high-level filtering or validation, following queries, but before WordPress does any routing, processing, or handling. It is run in the main() WP method in which the $query_args are passed to parse_request(), as well as when send_headers() , query_posts(), handle_404(), and register_globals() are setup.
trans-unit.target: 在查询之后，但在WordPress进行任何路由，处理或处理之前，此钩子是执行任何高级筛选或验证的一个有效位置。它在main（） WP方法中运行，在该方法中，$ query_args传递给parse_request（），以及在设置send_headers（），query_posts（），handle_404（）和register_globals（）时。

trans-unit.source: This hook is run immediately after any plugin is deactivated, and may be used to detect the deactivation of other plugins.
trans-unit.target: 该钩子在任何插件停用后立即运行,并可用于检测其他插件的停用情况。

trans-unit.source: This hook is the "activation" hook used internally by register_activation_hook(). The dynamic portion of the hook name, $plugin, refers to the plugin basename.
trans-unit.target: 该钩子是register_activation_hook（）内部使用的“激活”钩子。挂钩名称 $plugin 的动态部分是指插件的基本名称。

trans-unit.source: This hook is the "deactivation" hook used internally by register_deactivation_hook(). The dynamic portion of the hook name, $plugin, refers to the plugin basename.
trans-unit.target: 该挂钩是register_deactivation_hook（）在内部使用的“停用”挂钩。挂钩名称 $plugin 的动态部分是指插件的基本名称。

trans-unit.source: This hook is theme-dependent which means that it is up to the author of each WordPress theme to include it. It may not be available on all themes, so you should take this into account when using it.

trans-unit.source: This hook only fires for logged-in users. trans-unit.source: This is a helper method for wpdb’s CRUD methods, which take field/value pairs for inserts, updates, and where clauses. This method first pairs each value with a format. Then it determines the charset of that field, using that to determine if any invalid text would be stripped. If text is stripped, then field processing is rejected and the query fails.
trans-unit.target: 这是wpdb的CRUD方法的辅助方法，该方法采用字段/值对进行插入，更新和where子句。此方法首先将每个值与格式配对。然后，它确定该字段的字符集，使用该字符集确定是否将删除任何无效的文本。如果删除了文本，则将拒绝字段处理，并且查询将失败。

trans-unit.target: 用于检查特定字符的数字是否为偶数。

trans-unit.source: This is used to check that the number of opening and closing characters is equal.
trans-unit.target: 用于检查开头和结尾字符的数量是否相等。

trans-unit.source: This is used to lazily initialize the attributes property of a block, such that it is only prepared with default attributes at the time that the property is accessed. For all other inaccessible properties, a null value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 这用于懒惰地初始化块的 attributes 属性，以便仅在访问该属性时使用默认属性对其进行准备。对于所有其他不可访问的属性，将返回 null 值。

trans-unit.source: This is used to pass a WP_Error from an authentication method back to the API.
trans-unit.target: 这用于将WP_Error从身份验证方法传递回API。

trans-unit.source: This is used to store the raw data you want to display. Generally you will set this property directly in the prepare_items() method.
trans-unit.target: 这是用来存储你要显示的原始数据的,一般来说,你会在prepare_items()方法中直接设置这个属性。一般来说,你会直接在prepare_items()方法中设置这个属性。

trans-unit.source: This is used when sending cookies to a server.
trans-unit.target: 这是在向服务器发送Cookie时使用的。

trans-unit.source: This is used when sending cookies to clients. This isn’t really applicable to client-side usage, but might be handy for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 在向客户端发送cookie时使用。这并不是真正适用于客户端使用，但可能对于调试很方便。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for WP_Customize_Setting instances to watch in order to update a cached previewed value.
trans-unit.target: 这对于 WP_Customize_Setting 实例进行监视以更新缓存的预览值很有用。

trans-unit.target: 该类在内部未使用，但由外观调用。

trans-unit.source: This iterates over all error codes and messages to change it into a flat array. This enables simpler client behaviour, as it is represented as a list in JSON rather than an object/map.
trans-unit.target: 这将迭代所有错误代码和消息,将其变为一个平面数组。这使得客户端的行为更加简单,因为它在JSON中被表示为一个列表,而不是一个对象/地图。

trans-unit.source: This label is only used for hierarchical taxonomies. Default 'Parent Category'.
trans-unit.target: 这个标签只用于层次分类法。默认为 "父类"。

trans-unit.source: This label is only used for non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default 'Add or remove tags', used in the meta box when JavaScript is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 这个标签只用于非层级分类法。默认的 "添加或删除标签",当JavaScript被禁用时,在meta框中使用。

trans-unit.source: This label is only used for non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default 'Popular Tags'.
trans-unit.target: 这个标签只用于非层级分类法。默认为 "流行标签"。

trans-unit.source: This label is only used for non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default 'Separate tags with commas', used in the meta box.
trans-unit.target: 这个标签只用于非层级分类法。默认的 "用逗号分隔标签",在元框中使用。

trans-unit.source: This label is only used on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default 'Choose from the most used tags', used in the meta box.
trans-unit.target: 这个标签只用于非层级分类法。默认的 "从最常用的标签中选择",在元框中使用。

trans-unit.source: This lets you offer properly localized translations of any strings used in your script. This is necessary because WordPress currently only offers a localization API in PHP, not directly in JavaScript (but see ticket #20491).
trans-unit.target: 这让您可以为您的脚本中使用的任何字符串提供正确的本地化翻译。这是必要的,因为WordPress目前只在PHP中提供本地化API,而不是直接在JavaScript中提供(但请参见票据#20491)。

trans-unit.source: This list includes URI attributes both allowed and disallowed by KSES.
trans-unit.target: 这个列表包括KSES允许和不允许的URI属性。

trans-unit.source: This live preview and management of widgets via the Customizer serves as a secondary option to the traditional widget management workflow already in place.
trans-unit.target: 这种通过 "自定义器 "进行实时预览和管理的小部件,可以作为传统的小部件管理工作流程的辅助选项。

trans-unit.source: This method also works around a PHP bug where the root directory (/) cannot be opened by PHP functions, causing a false failure. In order to work around this, the path is converted to /./ which is semantically the same as / See https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=64169 for more details.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还可以解决PHP错误，在该错误中PHP函数无法打开根目录（/），从而导致错误的失败。为了解决此问题，将路径转换为/./，其语义与/相同。有关更多详细信息，请参见https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=64169。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to initialize the
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以用来初始化

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to refresh WordPress’ rewrite rule cache. Generally, this should be used after programmatically adding one or more custom rewrite rules.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于刷新WordPress的重写规则缓存。通常，应在以编程方式添加一个或多个自定义重写规则之后使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method checks for an existing database and creates a new one if it’s not already present. It doesn’t rely on MySQL’s "IF NOT EXISTS" statement, but chooses to query all tables first and then run the SQL statement creating the table.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查现有数据库，如果尚不存在，则创建一个新数据库。它不依赖于MySQL的“ IF NOT EXISTS”语句，而是选择先查询所有表，然后运行创建表的SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: This method contains a ‘session_token_manager’ filter, allowing a plugin to swap out the session manager for a subclass of WP_Session_Tokens.
trans-unit.target: 此方法包含一个'session_token_manager'过滤器，允许插件将会话管理器 WP_Session_Tokens 的子类。

trans-unit.source: This method copies the array elements into the parameter variables. Any changes to the parameter variables do not affect the original array.
trans-unit.target: 本方法将数组元素复制到参数变量中。对参数变量的任何改变都不会影响到原来的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether we need to override the regular password check in core with a filter.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法决定了我们是否需要用过滤器覆盖核心中的常规密码检查。

trans-unit.source: This method does not do anything if the theme does not have a default header image.
trans-unit.target: 如果主题没有默认的头像,这个方法不做任何事情。

trans-unit.source: This method does not update custom fields in the database. It only stores the value on the WP_User instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会更新数据库中的自定义字段。它仅将值存储在WP_User实例上。

trans-unit.source: This method exists because the partial object and context data are passed into a partial’s render_callback so we cannot use get_custom_logo() as the render_callback directly since it expects a blog ID as the first argument. When WP no longer supports PHP 5.3, this method can be removed in favor of an anonymous function.
trans-unit.target: 之所以存在此方法，是因为部分对象和上下文数据被传递到部分对象的render_callback中，因此我们不能直接将get_custom_logo（）用作render_callback，因为它期望将博客ID作为第一个参数。当WP不再支持PHP 5.3时，可以删除此方法以使用匿名函数。

trans-unit.source: This method extracts the name of a plugin from its filename.
trans-unit.target: 本方法从一个插件的文件名中提取其名称。
